SA10n1014:3: vaśena grastā hi praṇaṣṭaprajñā nāgārjunādīṃśca mahāmahimnaḥ |
SA10n1014:8: paramārthagambhīrodadhinayamanavagāhya atra kecidāhuḥ - yuktyāgamābhyāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sidhyatīti cet ?
SA10n1014:12: syādapi sambandhastathāpyarvāgdarśibhiravadhārayituṃ na śakyate prekṣakāstatpravacanamata-mabhyupagamyamānebhyo'pi niḥsaṃśayaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāpratipādakaṃ kimapi vacanamupadarśayituṃ na śaknuvanti |
SA10n1014:18: trayāṇāṃ svabhāvānāṃ parikalpitaparatantrapariniṣpannānāṃ kramaśaḥ lakṣaṇata utpattitaḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ sandhāya sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā uktāḥ,
SA10n1014:26: tena sarvabhāvā api mṛṣā eva vyavasthāpyante |
SA10n1014:31: na khalu sarve bhāvāḥ pratyakṣata evaṃ viviktāḥ [ śūnyāḥ ] anubhūyante |
SA10n1014:33: abhāvāya tāvad nīrūpatayā na kathamapi svarūpopadarśanena vijñānajanakatvaṃ yujyate,
SA10n1014:40: atha kaiścid arthāntarā viviktateti pakṣo gṛhyate,
SA10n1014:41: tadā itareṇa tāvat pratyakṣeṇa śūnyatā grāhyā syāt |
SA10n1014:42: sarvadharmaḥsvabhāvavādiṣu ye kecana [ dharmāḥ ] pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyante [ te ] sarve dharmā viviktāḥ pratīyeran |
SA10n1014:47: [ 5 ] ayaṃ tāvad [ viṣayaḥ ] sarvajñādīnāṃ yogināṃ pratyakṣeṇa sugamya ityucyamāne'pi na khalu vidvadbhyastṛptimāsādayati,
SA10n1014:53: [ 6 ] nāpyanumānenāpi ' sarve bhāvāḥ śūnyāḥ ' iti sādhayituṃ śakyate,
SA10n1014:56: svabhāvāśrayarahitaiḥ sarvahetubhiḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sādhayituṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:57: [7] paraiḥ siddhatvāt parābhyupagatahetvādibhiḥ svapakṣaḥ prasidhyediti cet tadāpi na yujyate,
SA10n1014:59: ithaṃ yadā parābhyupagatahetvādayo yadi na vāstavikāḥ,
SA10n1014:66: parābhyupagatasādhanādayo yadi sanmātrā evābhyupeyante tadā bhāvā api sasvabhāvāḥ kathaṃ nābhyupeyante ?
SA10n1014:67: [8] sarvadharmaśūnyatā kutrāpi kenāpi hetunā na sambaddhā,
SA10n1014:69: yadi [ sambandhaḥ ] siddhaḥ syāt tadā sarve tattvadarśinaḥ syuriti prasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:70: pūrvata eva siddhatvād yuktyanusaraṇamapi nirarthakaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:71: [9] api ca, na tāvat kārya-svabhāvaliṅgābhyāṃ śakyate sādhayituṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā |
SA10n1014:73: tvanmate tu etau [ kārya-svabhāvau ] na sambhavataḥ tathā hi-sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpannatvena kasyāpi kenāpi saha kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānabhyupetatvāt kāryahetustāvanna sambhavati |
SA10n1014:74: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvena kasyāpi ātmanaḥ svabhāvasyāsattvāt kutastāvat svabhāvahetuḥ |
SA10n1014:77: sā taditaraviviktasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣataḥ pratītau satyāmapi asacchāstraśravaṇavimūḍhamanasā kenacit taditaravivekavyavahāre'pravṛttānāṃ tadvyavahāraprasādhanāya prayujyata iti |
SA10n1014:78: tava tu sādhyamānasarvadharmābhāvavyavahārasya pratyakṣataḥ jñānārthaṃ kiñcidapi nāstyeva,
SA10n1014:81: atyantaparokṣāt sarvadharmavivekāt sahānavasthānavirodhenāpi na kiñcidapi sidhyati |
SA10n1014:82: yadi sidhyet tadā tadviruddhādayo bhāvatvenaiva sidhyeyurityanabhyupetā na syuḥ |
SA10n1014:85: ye tatrāvikala-kāraṇāni tebhyo niyataṃ yasminna bhavati,
SA10n1014:88: yad yasmin parihriyate yanna vicchidyate tayorubhayorabhāvayordvitīyo virodho vyavasthāpyate,
SA10n1014:90: tathāvidhau dvāvapi virodhau sarvadharmāniḥsvabhāvavādiṣu naiva sambhavataḥ |
SA10n1014:91: gaganāravindādiṣu na santi avikalakāraṇānyapi tathā nāsti atadvyāvṛttyā paricchedo'pi bhāvaparyantavāt |
SA10n1014:92: sattāvyavacchena yadyapi paricchedo vyavasthāpyate tathāpi kutracit kācit,
SA10n1014:94: kintu bhavantastāvat kutrāpi kasyāpi vyavacchedaṃ kathamapi naivābhyupagacchanti |
SA10n1014:95: yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatāpratyāsannāstadā yuṣmāsu kimapyavikalakāraṇasattvaṃ na sidhyet |
SA10n1014:98: tadā ta evāsmāsu vastusantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ tadviruddhopalabdhyasambhavāt |
SA10n1014:102: [13] vyāpakānupalabdhirapi vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau vyāpyaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmasvabhāvaśūnyatvaṃ tu tāvanna kasyāpi vyāpyaṃ sidhyatīti |
SA10n1014:103: yadi sidhyatīti cet tad vyāpyameva hi vastutayā siddhaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:104: [14] kāraṇānupalabdhirapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau kāryatvaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva siddho na bhavati |
SA10n1014:105: yadi siddhastadā yat kāraṇaṃ yaccāpi vā kāryaṃ tadeva vastu syāt |
SA10n1014:106: [ 15 ] sarvadharmeṣu kasyāpyekasya niṣedhād eteṣāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapyekaṃ kāraṇam |
SA10n1014:109: eteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ nimittānyapi niṣeddhuṃ na śakyante,
SA10n1014:111: [17] api ca, nairātmyaṃ yadi sarvadharmagocaratāyāṃ sādhyate,
SA10n1014:119: [19] yadi lokaprasiddhā rupādayastadā dṛṣṭānta eva tāvannopalabhyate,
SA10n1014:125: yadi sa nirākriyate tadā pratyakṣasyaiva bādhaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:126: yadi sa badhyate tadā nānumānasyāpi sausthityam |
SA10n1014:127: pratyakṣasambandhādanuprāptānumānenāpi sa eva kathaṃ bādhayituṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:128: yadi pratyakṣasiddho'rtho na bādhyate tadā vastuvādināmeva sausthityam,
SA10n1014:130: [21] api ca, sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sādhayitu yadi kaścid bhāvasvabhāvo hetuḥ pradarśyate,
SA10n1014:132: [22] yadi abhāvasvabhāvastadā asadabhavayoḥ parasparasambandhāabhāvāt kathaṃ sādhayiṣyati ?
SA10n1014:136: yato hi tat sādhayituṃ nānyat kimapi pramāṇamiti |
SA10n1014:140: yato hi yadi niḥsvabhāvastadā kathaṃ sa siddhaḥ |
SA10n1014:168: yanna svato nobhayato nāpi vinaṣṭāddhetornāpyahetuto nābhīṣṭānnityāddhetoḥ kāryotpattirbhavatīti tathāvādinastat [ sarvaṃ ] yujyate,
SA10n1014:173: yato hi yadanantaraṃ kāryamutpadyate tadeva ' para 'ḥ ityabhidhīyate |
SA10n1014:174: kāryotpādāt prāk pareti nāmro'siddhatve'pi bhāvasya tu naiva hāniḥ |
SA10n1014:180: yadyevamasti tadā kasmiṃścidaparasmin drāridrayamūḍhatvādidharmāṇāṃ dṛśyatvena paratvahetoḥ sarvajagaddāridrayādidharmopādānaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:181: [28] avyavahitādavinaṣṭāt parāt kāryotpattau kāryakāraṇasamakālikatvaprasaṅgo bādhakapraṇamiti yadi kaścidevaṃ manyate,
SA10n1014:188: yathā avyavahitavinaṣṭo bhāva uttarakṣaṇabhāvinā bhāvena saha yugapad vyavasthāpyo na bhavati,
SA10n1014:191: yathā ca pūrvāparāvyavadhānena pravahamānajaladhārāyāṃ viṣayaikatvaṃ na bhavati,
SA10n1014:192: tathaiva asyāpi tatsadṛśatvāt samakālikatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1014:197: yadi vidyamānakāryasyotpattinirṣidhyate tadā tava [ pakṣe ] ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaśca na syātām |
SA10n1014:201: naiva ca syāt śaśaśṛṅgādyutpattiprasaṅgaḥ tattathāvidhahetūnāmabhāvādanutpatteḥ na tvabhāvāddhetoḥ |
SA10n1014:205: anyathā sāṃvṛtike'pi kāryakāraṇabhāve kathaṃ na sarvataḥ sarvotpattirbhavatīti |
SA10n1014:206: [31] api ca, yadi vinaṣṭāvinaṣṭādayo vikalpāḥ pāramārthikīmutpattiṃ bādhante,
SA10n1014:208: vastubalapravṛttasya hetorviṣasya puruṣecchāvaśena vibhāgo na yuktarupaḥ |
SA10n1014:209: yadi patyakṣabādhitatvāśaṅkayā tasmin hetutvaṃ na pravartata ityucyeta tarhi sa hetureva nāsti,
SA10n1014:221: tadanantaraṃ yadi sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirna bhavettadā sarveṣāmandhabadhiratvādiprasaṅga ityapi kathanaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:227: anekasmād vā ekasyotpattiḥ [ tataḥ sa ] viruddho hetusvabhāvātikrānto janakatvenānabhyupagato bhavati,
SA10n1014:228: tathāpi vidyamānamātrādanekasvabhāvāt pradīpādeḥ anekasvabhāvaṃ kāryamutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate |
SA10n1014:229: hetubhedo bhedako na bhaviṣyatīti na syāt,
SA10n1014:231: hetuviśeṣeṇa kāryaviśeṣotpāda iti yadeva kathanaṃ tadeva hetubhedasya bhedakatvapratipādakamiti |
SA10n1014:232: [33] yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa prakṛtyā śānta ityetadanaikāntikatvam,
SA10n1014:237: [34] yo hi paramārthato'san sa saṃvṛtāvapi svabhāvato'nutpanno dṛśyate,
SA10n1014:243: ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvāt' ityevamabhidadhānā ye prasaṅgaṃ sādhayanti teṣāmapi tathā parairanaṅgīkārād heturasiddha eva,
SA10n1014:247: yadi paryudāsātmake tadā ekānekasvabhāvarahitātvasya bhāvasvabhāvatvenābhyupetatvāttadapyanabhyupagataṃ na bhavet |
SA10n1014:250: [37] yacca sarvābhilāpavirahalakṣaṇaṃ tanna kiñcid gamyaṃ gamakaṃ vā,
SA10n1014:256: [39] yadyubhe abhāvasvabhāvatvena tādātmyalakṣaṇāpanne eveti manyase cet,
SA10n1014:264: [41] atrāpi vyāvṛttyā bheda iti manyate cet ?
SA10n1014:266: yadyevaṃ svād bhāva eva te syātām,
SA10n1014:268: [42] api ca yathā kenāpi ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvahetunā bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā sādhyate,
SA10n1014:272: [43] api ca, yadi vijñānamapyanyadharmavat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvaṃ syāttadā tadanupādeyaṃ syād vitathatvādanyadharmavat |
SA10n1014:274: naiva yogijñānamapi syānna ca taistattvapratibodhaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:275: naiva teṣāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ syānna ca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:277: [44] saṃvṛtau yogijñānādīnāmabhyupagamād buddhā api viparyastā bhaveyuriti prasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:278: [45] api cāsti bhavatāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvapratijñāyāṃ yuktyāgamābhyāṃ virodho'pi |
SA10n1014:282: [46] agnyādayo ye bhāvāḥ parokṣarvenābhyupagatāste'pi abhrāntena niyatadhūmādihetunā anumānapramāṇena satsvabhāvātmakā eva |
SA10n1014:289: tānyapi samastalokaikacakṣurbhūtena tāyinā svakīyenānāvṛtena jñānacakṣuṣā pratyakṣīkṛtya anyebhyo'pi samprakāśitāni,
SA10n1014:292: [48] bhagavatā khalu ye āntarabahyavastūnāmanekavidhāḥ pratītyasamutpādāḥ samupadiṣṭāste'pi svabhāvavirahitāḥ kathaṃ yujyante,
SA10n1014:294: [49] kuśalākuśalamarmaṇāṃ falabhūtā devanarakādigatayo bhavantīti svayambhuva upadeśāt kathaṃ na virodhaḥ,
SA10n1014:297: [51] sūtrādiṣu āryāṇāṃ mārgābhyāsabalena yā uttarottaralokottarajñānafalavyavasthā sā'pi na syāt,
SA10n1014:299: śaśaśṛṅgakṛtasopānamārge pādau nidhāya vandhyāputrasya aścaṅgasamucchritottuṅgaviśālaprāsādārohaṇaṃ na sambhavatītyato vyavadānapakṣāpavādo'pi syāt |
SA10n1014:307: no tu nīlam“ ityādinā tāvannīlādayo bhāvāḥ kalpānāpoḍhalakṣaṇena pratyakṣapramāṇena jñāyanta iti pratipāditam,
SA10n1014:308: naiva hi gaganotpalavartīni nīlādīni cakṣurvijñānenānubhūyanta iti |
SA10n1014:310: tat sarvatra nirodhadharmakam “ anena sādhyavyāptahetunā'numānapramāṇenopadarśitāḥ kṣaṇasthitadharmiṇo bhāvāḥ prasiddhā iti spaṣṭamupadarśitam |
SA10n1014:311: anena tāvadupadarśanena te [ bhāvā ] sasvabhāvatāyāṃ nirucyante,
SA10n1014:313: [57] “dhūmena jñāyate vahniḥ salilaṃ ca balākayā“ iti |
SA10n1014:314: agnyādayo bhāvāḥ kāryaliṅgena niyataṃ jñāyamānatvānniyataṃ svabhāvamavadhārayantīti suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate |
SA10n1014:316: [58] abhidharmādau ye ṣaḍ hetavaścatvāraśca pratyayā abhihitāste'pi sarvadharmānutpādavāde tāvatkathaṃ yujyante,
SA10n1014:318: [59] sūtreṣu sarve dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyataneṣu saṅgṛhītāḥ samupadiṣṭāḥ |
SA10n1014:319: skandhādīnāṃ bhagavatā kāryakāraṇasvabhāvatvasamprakāśanāt kathaṃ te sarvedharmānutpādatāyāṃ saṅgṛhītāḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1014:320: [60] yadi skandhadivyatiriktasya kasyacid dharmasya anutpādaḥ sādhyate tadā nāsti [ kaścit ] vivādaḥ,
SA10n1014:322: [61] yadyevaṃ manyate yatsaṃvṛtau pramāṇādīnāmabhyupagamānnaiva eṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dūṣaṇānāmavakāśo yujyata iti cet ?
SA10n1014:324: yato hi yāni pramāṇādīni saṃvṛtāvabhyupetāni tāni niścayena sarvābhilāpavidhuralakṣaṇaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vyāvṛttasvabhāvānyeva vyāhatāni syuḥ |
SA10n1014:325: yadyevaṃ na syāttatadā lokavirodha āgamavirodhaśca kathaṃ parihataḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:326: vayaṃ tu yat sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇaśaśaśṛṅgādiviparītaṃ tadeva ' vastu ' ityabhidadhmahe |
SA10n1014:327: yadi bhavantastānapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmamātramupacāramātraṃ vyavahāramātramiti pravyāharanti,
SA10n1014:330: [62] api ca, kā nāma saṃvṛtirityapi vaktavyam |
SA10n1014:342: bhavataḥ pratijñāyā eva hāniḥ bhavo'pyutpadyata eva,
SA10n1014:345: saṃvṛtiviparītasyānutpādasya paramārthatvāt tadā paramārthato'nutpāda eva syādityasambaddhabhidhānaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:353: tadā nityasya vikalpātmakatvāttat [itaraṃ] tāvat sāmarthyānnirvikalpaṃ jñānamityatasyadavasthāyāṃ 'saṃvṛtisat' -iti kathanaṃ tu nirvikalpakajñānena tatpratīyata ityabhihitaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:355: [tathātve ca] anumānakalpanāyā api tāvat parihāraḥ syāt savikalpakatvāttasyāḥ |
SA10n1014:358: śāstrakārā vā prākṛtā vā janāḥ prathame vikalpe bhāvo hyanekaparasparaviruddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10n1014:362: [66] atha māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti cet tadā ko hi nāma māyārtha iti vaktavyam |
SA10n1014:366: atha bhrāntijñānena māyeti cet tadā ābhyantarikajñeyanayena ko hi viśeṣaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:369: [68] atha śabdārtha iti cettadā kathabhedaḥ syāt,
SA10n1014:370: pratyātmādhigamyā ye sukhādayaste kutra saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ ?
SA10n1014:377: athaivaṃ manyate yadābhāsaparikalpyau vyāmiśrya sāmānyākārena gṛhyanta iti ?
SA10n1014:388: [69] atha kṣaṇamātrānantarānavasthānena asthirārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthastadviparītaśca nityārthaḥ paramārtha iti siddhasādhanamevaitat,
SA10n1014:391: ato nāsti vivādaḥ tathā sāṃvṛtikānāṃ vastusāmānyalakṣaṇāmāṃ yā nairātmyarupā dharmatā sā'sti paramārthataḥ |
SA10n1014:392: sā'pi utpādād vā tathāganāmanutpadād vā sarvakālamavikāratayā nityā'bhyupeyate |
SA10n1014:393: [70] atha asatyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti tadā kathaṃ sā satyamiti parasparaviruddhayoḥ satyāsatyayoraikātmyānupapatteḥ bhāvasvabhāvaiva kācana saṃvṛtirabhyupagantavyā,
SA10n1014:394: anyathā kathaṃ jagat tathā satyaṃ sidhyet,
SA10n1014:399: athāpramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyeta ?
SA10n1014:403: [73] api ca, yadi bhāvasvabhāvā abbhyupagamyante tadā teṣvāropito mithyāsvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtisatyam,
SA10n1014:408: tadā saṃvṛtirapi vitathā syāt paramārtho'pyaśakyavyavasthānaḥ syāt,
SA10n1014:410: [74] yadi yathākathañcana kañcidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāttadā kimarthaṃ sa sādhayate ?
SA10n1014:411: sa naiva paramārthaḥ kathaṃ sa jñānenāvadhārayituṃ śakyate,
SA10n1014:412: na ca paramārthaśabdenāpyabhidhātumarhaḥ evaṃ tāvannāyaṃ paramārthaḥ,
SA10n1014:416: yadi yathākathañcana kiścidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāt tadā paramārthato'sadbhāvasyaikasya yathākathañcana nirākaraṇād bhāvasattāyā evābhyupagamaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:423: ataḥ pakṣo'yam ' na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ ' iti na yujyate,
SA10n1014:425: evaṃ bhinnābhinnatvasya anyo'nyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvena ekasya pratiṣedhe'parasya vidhānaṃ na bhavettadā asattvameva |
SA10n1014:426: sa tadā pratiṣeddhumapi kathaṃ śaktaḥ ekasmin yugapatparyudāsaprasajyayorvirodhāt |
SA10n1014:427: [76] anyacca, bhavatāmanusāreṇa tu puṇyajñānasambhārau duṣparipūraṇau syātām,
SA10n1014:429: pūjā'nugrahakāmyayā yad dīyate tad dānaṃ tvatyantaṃ prasādamabhinirvartayati,
SA10n1014:431: sa cānupalambhaḥ kiṃ deyābhāvād vā viṣayābhāvād vā bhavati ?
SA10n1014:432: prathame tāvat pakṣe na ko'pi kimapi dadātīti puṇyasyaivābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
SA10n1014:433: sattvābhāvācca yo hi bodhisattvānāṃ sattvārthapariśramaḥ sa nirarthaka eva syāt,
SA10n1014:437: yadyevaṃ na syāuttadā bhagavatā bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ kathamarthibhyaḥ putrādidānaṃ kṛtam ?
SA10n1014:441: [77] api ca, 'sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ' ityettasya tāvat ko hyarthaḥ ?
SA10n1014:442: yadi svayambhāvasya abhāvānniḥsvabhāvā ityabhidhīyante tadā siddhasādhanameva,
SA10n1014:445: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā nirapekṣatvānnityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt |
SA10n1014:446: yadyucyeta-vinaṣṭā bhāvāḥ svasvabhāvenānutpannatvāt svasvabhāvena na santīti niḥsvabhāvāḥ ?
SA10n1014:452: kṣaṇikasya khalu vastuno dvitīye kṣaṇe'vasthānaṃ nābhyupeyate |
SA10n1014:453: yadyucyeta yathā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitasya grāhyagrāhakabhāvasya paramārthena svabhavato'sattvād sasattvaṃ tathā niḥsvabhāvatvamiti tadapi siddhasādhanam,
SA10n1014:455: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarve'pi tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1014:456: paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitena grāhyagrahakāreṇa virāhitā api āryajñānasya advaitātmanā gocaratvena sthitā eva |
SA10n1014:461: yadyucyeta ādito'nutpannatvāt sarve bhāvā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10n1014:463: atha pūrvamutpannasya vastunaḥ punaranupattyā sarve dharmā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10n1014:471: sarvadā ca pūrvavinaṣṭānāṃ sajātīyotpatteḥ atha bālapṛthagjanaparikalpitasya svalakṣaṇato'nutpādādanutpāda ucyate,
SA10n1014:474: atha svato'nutpādād anutpāda ityucyeta tadāpi nāsti virodhaḥ,
SA10n1014:477: yadi sarvaśaḥ sarvānutpādād anutpāda ucyate tadā darśanādivirodho durnivāraḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:478: yadi parasparaviśeṣānutpādād anutpādo'bhidhīyate tadā [ yadi ] tathatāsvabhavatāmupādāyocyate tadā nāsti doṣaḥ,
SA10n1014:479: [ kintu ] yadi lokaprasiddhasvabhāvatāmupādāyocyate tadā kena darśanādivirodho nivārayituṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:493: ' kulaputra, bodhisattvaḥ dharmamayoniśaḥ śabdaśaḥ pravicayya mahāyānaprasadāyatano na bhavati |
SA10n1014:494: śabdaśo'nabhipretya yoniśo manasi kṛtvā mahāyānaprasādāyatano bhavati |
SA10n1014:504: sāṃyogikasya svabhāvamabhisandhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yadasattvaṃ samprakāśitaṃ tacchabdaśo'bhiniviśya [ ye ] sāṃkleśikadharmāṇāṃ vaiyavadānīkadharmāṇāṃ cāpyasattve'bhiniviśante,
SA10n1014:507: [ ataḥ ] bodhisattvasya śabdaśo'bhiniviṣṭāyāmasaddṛṣṭi saiva tasya mahatī dṛṣṭiriti,
SA10n1014:510: tato vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭisaṃkleśāpavādadṛṣṭitattvāpavādadṛṣtayastāvajjāyante yadā nimittadṛṣṭyā sarvāpavādaḥ [yadā] kriyate tadā vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭerapyabhiniveśo jāyate,
SA10n1014:520: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani |
SA10n1014:521: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca vai na santi ca ||
SA10n1014:522: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratiṣedhābhyāṃ skandhānāṃ sattaiva tāvannirdiṣṭā |
SA10n1014:524: “ asti karma asti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate “ anena tāvad vacanena virodho'pi samupajāyate |
SA10n1014:525: evaṃ yadi paramārthataḥ karmāpyasti vipāko'pyasti tadā sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā bhavituṃ nārhanti |
SA10n1014:526: yadi saṃvṛtau santīti cet tadā karturapi saṃvṛtau sadbhāvāt “ kārakastu nopalabhyate“ ityevaṃ na vaktavyam |
SA10n1014:529: yadi te bhaved yathā dṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ ||
SA10n1014:531: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca ||
SA10n1014:532: anena yadi sarvadharmāṇāmasattvaṃ tadā saṃkleśavyadānayorapavādadoṣaḥ prasajyata iti nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:536: bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate |
SA10n1014:541: ataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena na sidhyanti |
SA10n1014:551: anena tāvad vijñānameva paramārthasattvānidarśanatvādiguṇopetaṃ śāścatocchedāntadvayavinirmuktamiti nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:556: “ ye paramārthasato'pi vijñānasyāpavādaṃ kṛtvā sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāmabhiniviśya śūnyatādṛṣṭikāste'cikitsyāḥ“ iti |
SA10n1014:563: sarvathātyantaviyuktaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ yattanna tenopalabhyata idaṃ śūnyatālakṣanamuktaṃ bhavati“ |
SA10n1014:568: anirvacanīyadharmatā'vabodhena saṃskārāsaṃskārābhyāṃ prajñaptamiti yaduktaṃ tena virodhaḥ syāditi |
SA10n1014:570: nāvaśiṣṭamiti yad bhavatā'bhihitaṃ tadapi yuktyāgamābhyāṃ viruddham,
SA10n1014:573: tathā hi kecana parahitāśayā eva pravartante |
SA10n1014:576: tathaivānye svasukhasampattisādhanatatparā anyavyāghātaṃ kṛtvā tadduḥkhavinivṛttito virajyate |
SA10n1014:578: tathaivetare tāvad bhavāntarakhecchato viramya svamuktyarthaṃ prayatante |
SA10n1014:579: aye tu kevalaṃ paravimuktimevānucintayanti saṃbodhinidānāṃ ca dānādipāramitāpravṛttimālambante |
SA10n1014:582: svābhilāṣadvāreṇaiva pravṛttidarśanād śraddhaiva hi pravṛttiheturiti niścitam |
SA10n1014:584: ato nānāgotratvāt sattvānāṃ tulyajātīyagotrakairvidhīyamānapratipattiviśeṣānurūpaṃ falalakṣaṇayānamapi nānā bhavatīti yuktibhirnānāyānataiva niścīyate |
SA10n1014:591: evamevānekeṣu sūtreṣvapi śrāvakādiyānatrayanirdeśād āgamato'pi tāvannānā yānāni sidhyantīti |
SA10n1014:592: āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkādiṣu yaddhi ekaṃ hi yānamiti vyapadiṣṭam,
SA10n1014:594: dharmadhātulakṣaṇatayā yānānāṃ bhedābhāvād ekameva yānamiti tadabhiprāyaḥ |
SA10n1014:595: athavā yānīkṛtaṃ yānamiti yānikurvatāṃ śrāvakādipudgalānāṃ nairātmye'tulyatvābhāvād ekameva yānam |
SA10n1014:597: athavā aniyatagotrakāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ mahāyānenaiva niryāṇād ekameva yānaṃ deśitam |
SA10n1014:601: athavā bhagavatā svayamanekadhā śrāvakayānādibhirniryāṇadvāraiḥ parinirvāṇasandarśanād ekameva yānam |
SA10n1014:602: athavā nāsti mahāyānād viśiṣṭataraṃ yānāntaramiti tadadhikārād ekameva yānamiti,
SA10n1014:604: athavā aniyatānāṃ śrāvakagotrīyāṇāmākarṣaṇārthaṃ bodhisattvagotrīyāṇāṃ ca sandhāraṇārthamityabhiprāyo bhagavataiva āryadaśadharmakasandhinirmocanalaṅkāvatārādiṣu sūtreṣu spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ |
SA10n1014:605: anyacca, naikabhavaparamparāyāṃ sambhārān paripūrya bodhisattvā buddhatvapadamadhigamiṣyanti |
SA10n1014:606: śrāvakā aśeṣabhavasaṃyojanaṃ prajahantīti teṣāṃ naikajanmasādhyaṃ buddhātvadhigantuṃ ko'pi bhavapratīsandhirnaiva sambhavati,
SA10n1014:607: tathā hi-mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ yaduktaṃ so'pyātmagrahaprabhava eveti niyatam abhīṣṭaṃ ca |
SA10n1014:609: tatsamucchedena teṣāṃ janmano'pyādhārarasyābhāvāt tad [ janma ] api samucchidyate |
SA10n1014:611: āryāsaddharmapuṇḍarīke bhagavatā yacchrāvakebhyo buddhātvādhigatervyākaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tattu nirmitaśrāvakāṇāṃ nirmāṇasya,
SA10n1014:620: katipayeṣu [sūtreṣu]-“tathāgatagarbhāḥ sarve sattvāḥ“ iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tathatālakṣaṇāyāstathatāyā abhiprāyeṇa vyapadiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:625: tatra tāvad 'nāgamataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ,
SA10n1014:627: kiṃ kenāpyanabhyupetatvādāgama ekāntenānupādeya eva bhavatyuta utadeyo'pīti ?
SA10n1014:638: tadvidāṃ sudhiyāṃ viraheṇa bhagavata ādimadhyaparyavasānakalyāṇaṃ pravacanaratnamanāśritā api kiṃ tāvadadhigatasvaparahitasampādanonopāyaṃ tarkanipuṇaṃ vidvāṃsamapi nāśrayiṣyante ?
SA10n1014:639: athavā, ajñā vaṇijo yathā vimugdhatayā'narghaṃ ratnamapi parityajanti tathā suvijñāstarkanipuṇā api vaṇijastanna parigṛhṇantīti na |
SA10n1014:640: tāpāccedācca nikaṣāt suvarṇamiva pratyakṣānumānapūrvaparāviruddhāgamairaviruddhātvāt pareṣāñcāgamānāṃ tadviparītatvād ābhyudayikanaiḥśreyasikanaiḥśreyasikafalamāptukāmā aśeṣasampadamadhigantukāmā vipaścitastaṃ [viparītāgamaṃ ] parityajya yadekāntakuśalaṃ tatpravacanaratnamevāśrayantīti yaḥ pakṣaḥ,
SA10n1014:641: sa cet samyagiti tadā bhavanto'pi yadi bhagavatpravacanaṃ suparīkṣyaivābhyupayantītyato bhagavatā prajñāpārāmitādiṣu yo hi madhyamo mārgaḥ suspaṣṭamādiṣṭastaṃ kinnāśrayiṣyantīti ?
SA10n1014:642: yadi svayaṃ tamāśrayituṃ na śaktāstathāpyāryanāgātjunapādairyo hyanekayuktipradīpaprakāraiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭastadbalenāpi kimiva nābhyupagacchanti ?
SA10n1014:643: yato hi sa ācāryastāvad bhagadvacananirdiṣṭatvena prathamāṃ bhūmimāsāditatvena cāryalaṅkāvatārādau vyākṛtaḥ |
SA10n1014:644: tasyāpi yadi nirdeśo viparyastaḥ syāttadā naiva tāvad bhagavatā tathā vyākṛtaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:645: ato yadayācāryavacānaṃ tyajyate bhagavadvacanamapi nūnaṃ parityaktaṃ bhavet |
SA10n1014:646: falata āryanāgārjunapādapratipadītaṃ mārgaṃ parityajya anāryapudgalapradarśitapathāśrayaṇaṃ tāvānnaiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:647: na vayaṃ śabdānāṃ bhāvikaḥ kaścana sambandha iti manyāmahe |
SA10n1014:649: te tāvat [śabdāḥ] saṅketābhijñānena vyavahāre vakturicchāṃ dyotayante arthāvasthādibhirabhrāntapuruṣairabhihitāḥ śabdāḥ vivakṣitārthāsambaddhā iti na sarvathā niścetuṃ śakyate,
SA10n1014:651: kṣīṇarāgadveṣamohānāṃ śabdā aviparītārthā iti pratipādanena sarveṣāṃ śabdā viparītārthā evati na,
SA10n1014:653: atastrirupapaliṅgāni parikṣaṇapariśuddhāni ādimadhyāntakalyāṇaniyatāni tāvad vacanāni avisaṃvādakatvād vidvadbhiḥ samāśrayaṇīyānyeva |
SA10n1014:654: [2] na vayaṃ tathāgatavacanapratihatebhyastīrthikebhyastātsiddhaye bhagavadvacanaprāmāṇyaṃ pratipādayāmāstathāpi yadā āgamārthaṃ vinintayāmastadā vyākaraṇapramāṇatvena sampradarśayāmaḥ |
SA10n1014:660: athavā yadartho nānyatra netuṃ śakyata iti |
SA10n1014:669: na katipayeṣu “ avameva punastatraivoktam-“ tadyathāpi nāma devaputra,
SA10n1014:685: ato yāni ca yāvanti ca paramārthamadhikṛtya anutpādīni lakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni tāni sarvāṇi nītārthatvena grahītavyāni,
SA10n1014:689: yāvad ye sūtrāntā saṃvṛtipratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante neyārthāḥ yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ paramārthapratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante nītārthāḥ |
SA10n1014:694: yāvad ye sūtrāntā ātmasattvajīvapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakāravedakān anekarutairasvāmikān svāmina iva nirdiśanti,
SA10n1014:696: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatā'nimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥsattvanirjīvaniḥpudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāsta ucyate nītārthāḥ-iti vistaraḥ |
SA10n1014:699: ekaṃ hi sthitau ātmādinirdeśā api nītārthāḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1014:705: yadyevaṃ tadā kathaṃ bhagavatā āryasandhinirmocanasūtre trividhasya svabhāvasya trividhāṃ niḥsvabhagavatāmabhipretya sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ,
SA10n1014:709: atha cāsacchastraśravaṇābhiniśavaśād viparyastamatayaḥ saṃvṛtau asantamanṛtamapi nityādivasturupatayā samāropya yathā rupapratibhāsaṃ tathaiva parigṛhṇanti,
SA10n1014:710: te āropāpavādāntadvayapatitatamatitayā antadvayarahite paramagambhīre paramārthanayasāgare nānupraviśanti |
SA10n1014:711: ataeva tāvad bhagavān ' anutpādādinirdeśaḥ paramārthādhikṛtaḥ' iti nirucya trividhaniḥsvabhāvatābhiprāyapratipādakamantadvayarahitaṃ0 madhyamapathaṃ madhaymapathaṃ prakāśayituṃ nītārthameva mataṃ pratiṣṭhāpitavān |
SA10n1014:714: tatravicāritaṃ tāvad vastu yathāpratibhāsaṃ māyāvat pratītyasamutpannam,
SA10n1014:719: 'yaḥ prattyasamutpannaḥ sa svabhāvataḥ śūnya iti vidvāṃso nirdhārayanti |
SA10n1014:726: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham ||
SA10n1014:727: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca |
SA10n1014:736: yacca śūnyaṃ svabhāvena na hi taccasti kutracit ||
SA10n1014:741: yasmin dharme nāsti svabhāvaḥ sa na tāvad vastu |
SA10n1014:744: yadanutpannamaniruddhaṃ tad 'atītam' iti prajñaptuṃ naiva śakyate,
SA10n1014:745: na ca tadanāgataṃ pratyatpannamityapi vā prajñaptuṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:746: yacca kālatraye'pyanupapannaṃ tannāma lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ prajñaptamiti vā na bhavati,
SA10n1014:747: yato hi tat sattvānāṃ grahaṇārthaṃ nāmamātrasaṃketamātra-vyavahāramātrasaṃvṛtimātrābhidheyamātraprajñaptimātrebhyo'tiriktaṃ nāsti |
SA10n1014:753: ato hi bhagavan yacca nāmamātraṃ saṃketamātraṃ na tattathyamiti“ vistareṇābhihitam |
SA10n1014:754: ata eva paratantrasvabhāvo na tathyatve yujyate,
SA10n1014:759: māyādito'bhinno yo hi paratantrasvabhāvaḥ sa eva nityānityādibhiḥ paramārthata upacaritaḥ sa eva ca parikalpitasvabhāvaḥ so'pi yathā parikalpyate tathā lakṣaṇenāsiddhatvāllakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ vyavasthāpyate |
SA10n1014:760: sā'pi niḥsvabhāvatā vastutaḥ paratantrasvabhāve eva sthitā |
SA10n1014:762: ata eva yathā anityādibhiḥ parikalpitāḥ sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato lakṣaṇaśūnyatvena anutpannāḥ,
SA10n1014:765: ata eva hi prakṛtiparinirvṛtāḥ āryasandhinirmocane'pi yathoktam-
SA10n1014:771: ata evāhaṃ lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhavātābhisandhāya'sarve dharmā anutpannāḥ' iti yadupadiśāmi,
SA10n1014:773: paratantrasvabhāvaśca yathā saṃvṛtau hyuktastathā parikalpitātmanā virahitatvena prasidhya saṃvṛtisvabhāvasyānapavādamapi nirdiśati,
SA10n1014:777: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit |
SA10n1014:778: sarve dharmāḥ paramārthataḥ sadā bhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyāmeva pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti |
SA10n1014:781: sa hi pramāṇaiḥ samyugupapatrannasvabhāvatayā paramārtha ityucyate,
SA10n1014:785: “ sa ca paramārtho'pi dharmaniḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvito'pītyataḥ paramārthaniḥsvabhāvaḥ“ iti |
SA10n1014:793: falataḥ anutpādideśanāṃ nītārthāṃ sādhayituṃ darśanādivirodhaṃ parihartuṃ yathāśabdaparikalpanaṃ ca nirākartum āryasandhinirmocane tāvadabhihitam-
SA10n1014:795: paramārthaniḥsvabhāvaṃ dharmanairātmaprabhāvitamityabhipretya mayā sarve dharmā anutpannāḥ sarve dharmā aniruddhāḥ,
SA10n1014:798: yadyevaṃ mahāśraddadhāsūtre “ prayogajaṃ svabhāvamabhipretya yanmayā 'sarve dharmā asantaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tatra yathāśabdamabhiniviśca saṃkleśavyavadānadharmāṇāmapyabhāvamātramabhiniviśca asannimittagrahaṇād asaddarśanaṃ tad bhavedityato nimittadarśanaṃ taducyate |
SA10n1014:801: yo hi saṃvṛtau hetupratyayabalasambhūtatvena māyāvannisvabhāvatvena ca ' prayogajaḥ ' ityuktaḥ |
SA10n1014:804: etadarśaṃ yo hi parikalpitasvabhāva uktaḥ so'pyāgantuka eva kalpanābhinirhatatvāt |
SA10n1014:805: ata eva saḥ [ paratantraḥ ] prayogaja ityuktaḥ |
SA10n1014:807: ataḥ sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvenānena paramārthato niḥ svabhāvāḥ |
SA10n1014:809: yadi sa tāvadasat svāttadā saṃkleśavyadānadharmā naiva vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyeran,
SA10n1014:814: te pūrvasvabhāvamapi vasturupeṇa parigṛhya paścāttasyāpyabhāvaṃ matvā anutpannādideśanānāṃ śabdaśo'rthābhiniveśaṃ kurvanti |
SA10n1014:828: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca |
SA10n1014:829: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane ||
SA10n1014:831: sa tāvad bhāvābhiniveśapūrvaka iti sūtreṣu pratipāditam |
SA10n1014:834: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet ||
SA10n1014:835: ato ye khalu bhāvābhiniveśaparaśāste tāvat paratantraṃ sanimittaṃ paśyanti |
SA10n1014:836: ye tu vyapagatabhāvagrāhāste tathā na kurvanti,
SA10n1014:840: tatra nityādayo doṣāḥ sambhavanti na vā katham ||
SA10n1014:852: ye puṇyāni na kurvanti narāste kutsitā hatāḥ ||
SA10n1014:861: yaddhi proktaṃ tatkathamiti cintāyāmatrāpi yathā kathitasya parikalpitasvabhāvasya samāropo bhavati,
SA10n1014:867: “ samāropāpavādaṃ hi vikalpanto vinaśyati “ ityuktam | ata eva ca-
SA10n1014:872: tathā hiyathā vikalpyate tathā paramārthataḥ paratantrasyānutpannatvāt parikalpitātmanā anutpanna eva |
SA10n1014:874: saṃvṛtyā paratantratayā samutpannatvāt tadāśritā anye vikalpā nirmāṇanirmitasadṛśā samutpadyante | ata eva-
