SA10n1014:1588: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve'pi yoginaḥ pṛthagjana iva vyavahāratayā vyavasthāpayanti |
SA10n1014:1590: “ paramārthato'tyantābhāvaśca saṃvṛtyā ca mārgaṃ bhāvayatīti kathanavat “
SA10n1014:1591: ' yadarthāntaraviviktapākṣikena pratyakṣeṇa parigṛhya taditaraśūnyapratyakṣeṇa tāvadavabudhyate ' - ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
SA10n1014:1594: lakṣanaśūnyatve u sarve dharmāstāvat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvenaivābhyupagamyante,
SA10n1014:1597: yā hi vastūnāmitaretaraśūnyatā sā naiva paramārthaḥ,
SA10n1014:1603: yato hi svapnamāyādisadṛśavastūnāṃ svabhāvaḥ paramārthataḥ parasparamabhinnaḥ |
SA10n1014:1612: sā upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptā'pi satī yogibhiḥ paramārthatayā anupalabdhākāraiva |
SA10n1014:1613: ataḥ sarve dharmā nirābhāsajñānotpattyā jñātā bhavantīti vyavasthāpyate |
SA10n1014:1614: ata eva ca itaretaraśūnyatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ parikalpanāmaśrityaivābhihitā,
SA10n1014:1616: [5] sā ca ' yogipratyakṣeṇa samyagavagamye ' ti kathanaṃ naiva viduṣāṃ rucikaram |
SA10n1014:1617: yuktyabhāvastatreti yat kathanaṃ tadapi nāsti yuktisaṅgatam,
SA10n1014:1621: tathāhi - yathā kāmaśokabhayonmādādyupahateṣu asakṛdabhāsabalena pramadādyavabhāsi spaṣṭaṃ jñānamupajāyate yena te tān puraḥsthitaniva dṛṣṭvā sahasā vividhaśarīrakampādibhiśceṣṭamānā dṛśyante |
SA10n1014:1622: ataśca yathoktatatvaṃ bhāvayatsu tajjñanamutpatsyata eveti sambhāvyate |
SA10n1014:1629: yatra cirakālaṃ nirantaraṃ sādaraṃ sarvadharmanairātmyabhāvanaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ,
SA10n1014:1634: spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad yajjñānamavisaṃvādaṇaṃ janayati tat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
SA10n1014:1636: sarvadharmanairātmyaviṣayakaṃ yogināṃ jñānamapi spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad avisaṃvādakamiti svabhāvahetuḥ |
SA10n1014:1637: yadyevaṃ sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ yuktibhiḥ susādhyaṃ tadā kathamiva vidvāṃsastatra na pritāḥ?
SA10n1014:1643: na ca te'smābhirnābhyupeyanta iti yaduktaṃ tattathā |
SA10n1014:1647: sarvasāṃ yuktīnāṃ viṣayasya svabhāvasya cāsiddhatvāt“ ietyavamuktam,
SA10n1014:1649: itthamasmābhirniḥsvabhāvatvenābhyupete sati yadā bhavantaḥ prasaṅgamāpādayanti tadā sa prasaṅga eva nāsti |
SA10n1014:1652: tadā sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati,
SA10n1014:1657: vayaṃ tāvad bhavadbhiḥ prayuktaṃ dūṣṇamapi paramārthato'nutpannamevābhyupagacchāmaḥ |
SA10n1014:1662: ityaktam | yat paramārthato'sat tad vyavahāre'pi pravartituṃ na śakyata ityevaṃ yo hi prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10n1014:1665: yato hi yena kāraṇena yasyātmanivartanaṃ tena tasya vyavahāranivartanaṃ tu nāsti paramārthasvabhāvavyāptam,
SA10n1014:1668: paramārthasvabhāvavirāhitā api svapnādayo vividhavyavahāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante |
SA10n1014:1669: ataḥ sarve'pi tāvad vyavahārā nirmāṇasvapnādivadaviruddhā eva |
SA10n1014:1672: sarvatra sādhyadharmyādīnāṃ paramārthabhūtatvādeva anumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartanta iti hetoḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve sati nānumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartsyanta iti yo hi doṣa āropyate,
SA10n1014:1674: nirvivādarupatayā saprasaṅgatvāt paramārtadharmyādibhiḥ anumānādivyavahārāḥ kutrāpi naiva siddhāḥ,
SA10n1014:1675: tathāpi loke yathāprasiddha eva dharmiṇi vyavahārā bhavanti |
SA10n1014:1676: yato hi pravādino hi tattvānirṇayārthameva anumānādivyavahārān prayuñjanti | yathoktam-
SA10n1014:1687: pramāṇasya tāvat sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni tattvapravṛtyarthameva bhavanti,
SA10n1014:1689: pramāṇalakṣaṇaśāstrāṇyanadhīyānāsu gopālakāṅganāsu evamupadeśābhāve'pi dhūmādiliṅgadarśanato'gnyādīnāṃ jñānamutpadyata eva |
SA10n1014:1690: ata eva vayamapi tattvapraveśāya tathatāvyavahārābhyāmanumānādipravartanād doṣarahitā eva |
SA10n1014:1691: api ca, ye vyavahāreṇānumānādipravṛttau yatrānityādi vastudharmaṃ satsvabhāvaṃ sādhayanti,
SA10n1014:1692: teṣāṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ tatra vyavahāreṇa vastubhūtadharmādayaḥ syureva,
SA10n1014:1693: yato hi tatra tathāvidhā āśrayahīnā sādhyadisthitirnaiva siddhā |
SA10n1014:1694: yadi tatra tathāvidha āśrayo nāsti tadā sādhyaniṣedhanād āśrayā siddhyākhyo doṣo dīyate |
SA10n1014:1695: so'pi yadi yathābhūtadharmiṇo nivṛttiścettadā niḥsaṃśayaṃ sādhyādidharmiṇo'vinābhāvasya niṣedhaṃ karoti,
SA10n1014:1696: yato hi asiddhe sati hetvasiddhayādidoṣā dīyante |
SA10n1014:1697: svayamupakalpitānāṃ katipayadharmiṇāṃ nivṛttāvapi sādhayādeḥ kasyāpi niṣedhasyābhāvād asiddhayādidoṣā naiva yujyante,
SA10n1014:1710: ' codako doṣahīnaḥ ' ityapi kathanaṃ viparyayadoṣāṇuparipūrite paridhāvanamātrameva,
SA10n1014:1712: ata eva sādhyadharmaṃ tadanukūladharmiṇaṃ cāvagantuṃ pakṣalakṣaṇavelāyāmeva yuktividbhirviśeṣeṇa ' svadharma ' ityabhidhīyate |
SA10n1014:1718: sādhyasādhanayoriva ākāśādirnaiva vastubhūtaḥ svabhāvadharmīti sādhanabhūto'yaṃ heturāśrayāsiddha ityapare |
SA10n1014:1719: tatrāpi ākāśadidharmiṇāṃ vastutāyāḥ kṛte'pyatra nirākaraṇe sādhyābhāvamātramabhyupagacchatāṃ nāsti ko'pi doṣaḥ,
SA10n1014:1722: ato vipratipattinirākaraṇāya svābhimatadharmyeva yadi bādhyate cettadā sādhya eva tāvanniṣedhyo bhavati,
SA10n1014:1723: na tu dharmāntarayukto dharmītyevaṃ nirdeśakāle sveṣṭapratyakṣānumānāptaprasiddhidvārā niṣedhamavidhāya svabhāvasyaiva tāvanniṣedhaḥ svadharmī bhavatītyatra pakṣadharmatāvasthāyāmācāryeṇa svadharmī kathita iti vārtikakāraḥ | tathāhiḥ
SA10n1014:1737: anyathā kramayaugapadyābhyāmabhivyaktena arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogena paraparikalpitaḥ padārthāḥ kathamiva niṣeddhuṃ śakṣyante |
SA10n1014:1739: āśrayāsiddhadoṣeṇa yadi asato'pi naiva kartuṃ pāryate tadā niṣedha eva kasyāpi kathamapi kartuṃ naiva śakyate |
SA10n1014:1742: nāsti tat kṣaṇikaṃ vā'pi saccāpi na hi vidyate |
SA10n1014:1745: tairthikaiḥparikalpiteṣu dravya-guṇakarmasāmānyādiṣu niṣeddhumiṣyamāṇeṣvapi kathaṃ tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā naiva pravartsyante ?
SA10n1014:1746: yadi prasaṅgasādhanamātreṇaiva niṣedhanātra pravartsyanta ityevaṃ brūyāttadā apramāṇaṃ hi tatra prasaṅgasādhanam |
SA10n1014:1747: falata ekāntenaiṣāmabhāvo vyavahāre kathaṃ siddhaḥ syāt,
SA10n1014:1749: atha pramāṇameva prasaṅgasādhanamiti cettadā kimiva tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā na pravartante ?
SA10n1014:1750: yukttibalena āgantuśīleṣu doṣeṣu prekṣāvadbhiḥ svataḥ [ svapakṣataḥ] siddhirnaiva yuktimatī atha bāhyārthādīn niṣeddhukāmānāṃ vidyata eva vastubhūto buddhilakṣaṇo dharmī,
SA10n1014:1752: ataḥ āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣāstatra na pravartanta iti cettadā ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvakramayaupadyavyāptārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahitatvādo hetavastadā aprasiddhataddharmatvadharmiṇi abhīṣṭasādhyadharmaṃ sādhayiṣyantyeva |
SA10n1014:1755: yadi te tatprasiddhatvamabhyupagacchanti tadā bāhyapradhānādivat buddhireva śaktatvaikānekatvavyāptadharmaviyuktatvanniḥsvabhāvaiva tāvat setsyati,
SA10n1014:1759: anyathā [ yadyevaṃ na syāttadā ] tato bahya-pradhānādayo na niḥsvabhāvāḥ setyanti |
SA10n1014:1760: niḥsvabhāvatve khalu siddhe āśrayāsiddhadidoṣāṇāṃ tādavasthye'pi nāsti svapakṣahāniprasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:1761: buddhau tāvat siddhe'pi bāhyapradhānādibhirutpattiniṣedhe pradhānādīnāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvaniṣedhastu asiddha eva,
SA10n1014:1767: kecana tāvadajñāninastriṣu pratisaṃkhyānirodhāsaṃskṛteṣu kasyāpyutpattimattvābhāvaṃ paramārthavasturupeṇa parikalpayanti |
SA10n1014:1768: tanniṣeghasādhane ca buddhestāvat kathaṃ nāma viṣayibhāvo bhaviṣyati,
SA10n1014:1769: yato hyanye [ vādinaḥ ] teṣu tayā utpattimattvābhāvadharmaṃ nābhyupayanti |
SA10n1014:1771: atha anādikālinasvabījaparipākapariniṣpannabālānāṃ buddhau vidyamāno bāhyavastuvikalpa eva dharmī,
SA10n1014:1773: sa paramārthataḥ svabhāvavirahito'pi bhrāntyā bāhyamiva pradhānādyabhinnamiva sarvasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ ca sarvadharmasamavetamiva kalpayati |
SA10n1014:1775: yato hi sa bālairbāhyapadhānādyupagṛhītavādiprativādibhirapi taimirikairdvicandradarśanamiva tadabhinnatayaiva vyavahriyate |
SA10n1014:1776: sa hi yadyapi [ sarvathā ] buddhayā parikalpitamātra eva,
SA10n1014:1777: tathāpi tadākāratayā buddhirityevamupacaryate vastuto'yaṃ nāsti [ kathamapi ] buddhisvabhāvaḥ,
SA10n1014:1779: ataḥ siddhe'pi tasya niḥsvabhāvatve buddhiniḥ svabhāvatāyā nāsti prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10n1014:1780: yato hi bāhyapradhānādīnāṃ tāvanniṣedhastu pramāṇaiḥ sādhyate,
SA10n1014:1781: na tu [ kadācit ] tattvaniṣedhāya hetavaḥ prayujyante |
SA10n1014:1782: vastusatāṃ śabdādibāhyadharmiṇām anityādidharmasiddhaye [ te ] bāhyaśabdādayastabhinnāśca buddhistha upacāradharmiṇyevāśrayante,
SA10n1014:1783: yato hi te deśakālādibhīnnāvasthāniyatā bāhyaśabdādayo vādiprativādināṃ buddhau svasvabhāvena naiva pratyakṣībhavanti |
SA10n1014:1786: ato'numānāmeyādayaḥ sarve vyavahārā buddhistha eva dharmiṇyāśritāḥ pravartante,
SA10n1014:1788: yadyevaṃ tadā paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve parikalpitadharmiṇaṃ niḥśritya niṣedhādisiddhayartham āśrayāsiddhādidoṣāṇāmapravṛttavapi kāmaṃ balenāsmāsu apālambhāḥ kriyante |
SA10n1014:1789: yathā hi paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ bhavantaḥ pradhānādiniṣedhye parikalpitadharmiṇyeva sādhya-sādhanādīn manasikurvanti,
SA10n1014:1790: tathaiva vayamapi prasiddheṣu rupaśabdādiṣu ye tāvat sadasadādisvabhāvā āropyante,
SA10n1014:1792: tatra yathā āropite dharmiṇi vastutvāropaṇaniṣedhae'pi vādiprativādiṣu pratībhāsamānatvād asadādidoṣā na pravartante,
SA10n1014:1795: avabhāso hi tatkāraṇanivṛttyā jāyamānena satyasvabhāvena tāvannasti vyāptaḥ,
SA10n1014:1797: yadyevaṃ no cettadā sarve puruṣāstadarśinaḥ syuḥ,
SA10n1014:1799: yathaiva hi tasmin parikalpitadharmiṇi sāmarthyaśūnyatvavyāptyupanyāsena niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ prasādhya pradhānādayaḥ sādhyante,
SA10n1014:1800: tathaivāsmābhirapi parikalpitavastuni tat [ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ ] samyaktāa sādhayituṃ yathoktaḥ sāmarthyābhāvādiḥ kathaṃ na siddhaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:1804: atatstannirṇayo na kṛtaḥ vicāro'pi nirṇayārthaka eva |
SA10n1014:1805: yataḥ pramāṇādvārā siddhāntanirṇayakāle ko'pi siddhānto nābhyupagato bhavatītyatastasmin kāle kasmin āśrayāsiddhimukhena dharmyasiddhayādidoṣaḥ pradātuṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:1806: atha vādī pramāṇaistattvanirṇayaṃ kṛtvā parebhyastatpratipādayituṃ pravṛtaḥ,
SA10n1014:1810: pūrvata eva siddhāntamanabhyupagacchanto vādinaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇatastattvajñānaṃ kurvanti,
SA10n1014:1811: taireva cāparānapi bodhayantīti kathaṃ siddhanto'bhyupagataḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:1812: pūrvaṃ svayaṃ pramāṇaistattvaściyaṃ kṛvā siddhāntena aparebhyo'vabodhanamapi nāsti siddham |
SA10n1014:1813: apare'pi prekṣāvantastāvat tacchabdamātreṇaiva pramāṇairanupapanne'rthe naiva viśvasanti |
SA10n1014:1814: ataḥ svamirṇayavad aparebhyo'pi nirdeśasamaye tādavasthyāt sarvatra pramāṇaireva tattvanirṇayaḥ kriyate |
SA10n1014:1816: ata eva kathaṃ tena dharmiṇastāvadasiddhādayaḥ pratīpādyante |
SA10n1014:1817: samyakpramāṇabalena vādināmabhīṣṭasādhyasiddhāvapi ' siddhāntābhyupagamāt tebhyo doṣā jāyante ' iti ye vadanti kiṃ teṣāṃ yuktyantaramiti |
SA10n1014:1823: yadi tathāvidho dharmi siddho na syāttadā na ko'pi kutrāpi tatsādhanārthaṃ pratvarteta |
SA10n1014:1824: yadi tathāvidho siddhastadā taddharmoṃ'pi ubhayasammataḥ siddha eva |
SA10n1014:1826: ata eva sarve tattvajijñāsavaḥ siddhāntaviśeṣasiddhaṃ dharmiṇamapahāya āgopālaprasiddhameva tamāśritya sādhyasādhanaviṣayakaṃ cintanaṃ parivardhayanti |
SA10n1014:1830: [7] “ yatkhalu paraprasiddhapramāṇaiḥ svapakṣaḥ sādhanīyaḥ “ iti yaducyate tad dūṣaṇameva tāvanna bhavati,
SA10n1014:1832: ato vyavahāre vayam ubhayasiddhairhetvādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ sādhayāma ityevaṃ paścānnirdekṣyāmaḥ |
SA10n1014:1834: na kenāpi samyagliṅgenāliṅgitā atiparokṣatvād “ iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10n1014:1839: ataḥ avinābhāvaniyamanirdeśena sāmānyadharmiṇi sādhyadharmaṃ sādhayeyuriti kathanaṃ yujyata eva |
SA10n1014:1840: tadvadatrāpi māyā-marici-svapna-gandharvanagarādisadṛśeṣu katipayeṣveva dharmiṣu sa sidhyatītyataḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvād ekānekasvabhāvādidharmeṣu vyāptiḥ siddhaiva |
SA10n1014:1841: api ca, asmābhiranyatra savivādeṣu rupādiṣu vyāptidharmopadarśanena sādhitatvānnāsti doṣa iti |
SA10n1014:1842: [9-10] ye kecana-“ kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ naiva sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā iti sādhayituṃ śakyante,
SA10n1014:1846: yadā sādhanasvarupāntaḥpraviṣṭatvādimau vastusādhanāvityucyete tadā niḥsvabhāvatāyāmapi prayogaviśeṣavaśena sādhanasvabhāvāveva |
SA10n1014:1847: atastatsādhyāmānāyāṃ kathaṃ na tau [ hetū ] sambhavataḥ ?
SA10n1014:1849: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ “pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ“ iti sāmānyena hetulakṣaṇaṃ nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:1853: tathāpi imau dvāvapi teṣu vyavahārasatyatvena vidyete eva |
SA10n1014:1855: “ kevalaṃ samyak kāryamātreṇa svabhāvamātreṇa vā hetunā bhavitavyam“ iti yaduktam,
SA10n1014:1858: “ādarśadigataḥ pratibimbo hi tāvadanyadekaṃ rūpam“ iti yaduktam,
SA10n1014:1861: “tadeva rupaṃ tathaivālambyate“ idamapi kathanaṃ naiva samīcīnam,
SA10n1014:1868: ' vijñānasyaiva pratibimbākāratayā pratibhāsanādasti sa [ ākāraḥ] vijñāsvabhāvena vastusan' idi yaduktaṃ tadapi na yuktiyuktam,
SA10n1014:1869: yato hi amūrtaṃ nīlādivijñānaṃ niraṃśatayā sthitaṃ vividhākārarahitameva bhavatītyucyate |
SA10n1014:1870: pratibimbavastu tadvilakṣaṇatayā pratibhāsata ityataḥ kathaṃ sa [ākāraḥ] tatsvabhāvena san syāt |
SA10n1014:1871: yathoktaṃ bhavatā'pi triṃśikāyāṃ pudgalaniḥsvabhāvataṃ pratipādayatā yad yo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa sarvathā nithyaiva,
SA10n1014:1874: tathaivānye'pi paraparikalpitadharmā naivālambitā bhavantīti kathaṃ nocyate |
SA10n1014:1875: yathācāryairnirdiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsādhanāyāṃ vyāpyānupalabdhikṣaṇā dharmāḥ kathaṃ noktāḥ |
SA10n1014:1880: [11-12] viruddhopalabdhyādayo'sambhavā iti yaduktaṃ tā atyasambaddhā eveti |
SA10n1014:1881: yato hi sarve dharmā viviktāḥ katipaye ca sahaviruddhā iti na sidhyanti,
SA10n1014:1882: tathāpi māyā-khapuṣpādayaśca sāmānyatayā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sahaviruddhāśceti sidhyantyeva |
SA10n1014:1883: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā katham bhavadbhiḥ paraparikalpitā īśvarādayo niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyante |
SA10n1014:1884: ataḥ sāmānyena niḥsvabhāvatāmātreṇa yadi vyavahāre viruddhādayaḥ sidhyanti,
SA10n1014:1885: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthataḥ sattvābhyupagame virusśādharmādīnupadarśaya niḥsvabhāvatvena teṣāṃ samyak sādhanāt kimatra tāvad virodha |
SA10n1014:1887: yato hi paramārthato niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu bhūtarupābhivyaktistu,
SA10n1014:1890: ato yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥsahānavasthānaviruddhāśca sidhyantyatastadviruddheṣu vastutāprasaṅga iti na vaktavyam,
SA10n1014:1893: evameva dīpakādau adṛḍhalakṣaṇe vastuni paricchinne sati dṛḍhākāraviviktataiva tāvat paricchidyate,
SA10n1014:1898: sa abhāva eva tāavat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo viradho vyavasthāpyate |
SA10n1014:1902: prasiddhe'pi tasmin virodhe dīpakādayo hi vasturupeṇātyantamanupapannāḥ,
SA10n1014:1903: māyādimithyāvastuṣvapi jātivināśayoravabhāsamānatvāt ata eva ācāryaiḥ paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ yathā dīpakādiṣu nityānityādivirodho'vabhāsate,
SA10n1014:1907: paramārthavastusvabhāvena sahānavasthānalakṣaṇavirodhasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ paramārthavastusvabhāve na kathañcit pravartate,
SA10n1014:1911: yadi pratyayāntarairvināśa iti tadā na vināśahetubhistatra kimapyupakriyate |
SA10n1014:1912: pratyayāntaraiḥ kriyamāṇe'pi vināśe sa svahetubhireva kriyate,
SA10n1014:1914: yadyavastutvād vināśasya tattvena anyatvena vā tasya vijñaptirna yujyata iti cintyate tadā ātyantikatayā sa vināśakāraṇairna kriyate,
SA10n1014:1916: ato'kiñcitkarā agnyādayo hi kathaṃ nāma paramārthato viruddhāḥ setsyanti |
SA10n1014:1917: tathāpyagnyādayaḥ śītādīn kramaśo niḥsāmarthalakṣaṇān anityān prakarṣatamān utpādayantyata eva te hyagnyādayo viruddhā iti kevalaṃ vyavahriyanta eva |
SA10n1014:1918: ata ācāryairvirodhanayo'yamityukto na tu virodha evetyuktaḥ |
SA10n1014:1919: ataśca virodho'yaṃ vyavahāramātrāśrita evokto na tu paramārthāśritaḥ agniśītādayaśca na paramārthato bāhyārthasvabhāvāḥ sidhyanti,
SA10n1014:1926: yato hi vṛkṣādayo vyāpakāḥ vastutaḥ sāmānyātmakāḥ |
SA10n1014:1930: tathāpyukṣitatattvarthā vidvāṃso gajāvalokanamiva svapnadṛṣṭakhadirādivividhamithyāviṣayāṇāmanubhūtivad vṛkṣādivastūnāṃ mṛṣātvamevāśritya tathatāyāṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ paramārthānukūlatayā vyāpyavyāpakādivyavasthāṃ kurvate |
SA10n1014:1935: atastāni vyāvahārikeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvena vastusvabhāvatvena vyāptāni bhavanti |
SA10n1014:1936: kintu tāvatā tāni paramārthasvabhāvatayā na samavatiṣṭhante |
SA10n1014:1937: yato hi vyāpake vidyamāne'pi sati vyāpyasya siddhirna niyatā |
SA10n1014:1938: tathāpi vastusvabhāvatvena suvyāptāni kāryakāranavastūni yadi nivatante,
SA10n1014:1939: tadā māyādivat paramārthataḥ parikalpito vastusvabhāva eva nivartate |
SA10n1014:1942: tairthikaparikalpitatāni pramāṇādīnī tathātāyā ananukūlatvāt parītyājyānītī sanyakpramāṇalakṣaṇapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇayanaṃ kṛtamiti |
SA10n1014:1943: itthaṃ katipaye tairthikāḥ piṇḍātmādikaṃ mithyāvastutattvaṃ sisādhayiṣayā sarvajñatā-virāgitā-karmafalasambandhādīnāṃ sāṃvṛtikīṃ vyavasthāṃ nirākartuṃ pramāṇānāṃ viparītalakṣaṇāni kurvanti |
SA10n1014:1944: ataḥ sudhiyastāvattanniṣidhya pudgaladharmanairātmyatathatāyāṃ praveśānukūlāṃ sāṃvṛtikīṃ karmafalasambandhādivyāvasthāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ viśuddhāni pramāṇalakṣaṇāni viracitavantaḥ |
SA10n1014:1947: ato virodhādivyavahārāṇāṃ svīkṛtiātreṇa yo hi bhāvasvabhāvābhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10n1014:1950: [20] nanvevamanumānena saha sambandhaprasidhyarthaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate tadā vastunastāvat siddhireva,
SA10n1014:1952: abhrāntajñānenādhyavasitaḥ khalu vastusvabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nāmānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate ?
SA10n1014:1953: yadi nirakriyate tadā pratyakṣameva tāvad bādhitaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:1954: yadi tad bādhitaṃ syāttadānumānameva tāvanna syāt sisthitam |
SA10n1014:1955: pratyakṣasambaddhenāpyunumānena pratyakṣaṃ bādhyata iti kathanato naivācitamanyat |
SA10n1014:1956: yadi pratyakṣasiddho'rtho'numānena naiva bādhyate tadā prāpyasya prāptyā susthita eva tāvad vastuvādīti kathanamapi samyaṅnirākṛtameveti |
SA10n1014:1958: tatra yaddhi sādharaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat paramārthamadhikṛtya nāstyabhrāntam |
SA10n1014:1959: anyathā sarvaṃ yogipratyakṣameva syānna ca syuḥ kecanāpyarvāgdarśinaḥ |
SA10n1014:1960: yogipratyakṣātiriktaṃ sāmānya pratyakṣaṃ yadyapi [ abhrāntaṃ ] nāsti tathāpi vyavahāre svapnādivad yathāprasiddhenārthena sahāvisaṃvādāttadabhrāntamucyate |
SA10n1014:1965: falato yadeva sarvākāratattvamadhikṛtyābhrāntaṃ tadeva sarvākāratattvāvisaṃvādād yathārthamabhrāntamiti |
SA10n1014:1966: ata eva bhagavadbhireva tāvat sarvadharmalakṣaṇarahitatā parijñātā |
SA10n1014:1983: yato hi arvāgdarśibhirvāstavikaḥ paramārśasvabhāvaḥ pratyakṣatayā pṛthak pṛthak nānubhūyate |
SA10n1014:1984: ato naiva vastusvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtimapi bādhate kintu yo hi tatra satyākāratvāropastannirākṛtireva sādhyate |
SA10n1014:1985: falano vastuvādino arthābhāve'pi arthābhiniveśinaste kathaṃ susthitā iti |
SA10n1014:1986: ekato'numānaṃ vyavahāreṇa pratyakṣasambaddhaṃ sat sthitiṃ pratnoti,
SA10n1014:1987: aparataśca pratyakṣaṃ kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajatitāgniriva tadbādhāṃ karotīti bādhitameva taditi cennaitāvatā'smāsvaniṣṭāpattiriti |
SA10n1014:1989: sa ca mithyendhanāni bhasmīkṛtya svayamapyupaśāntaḥ praśāntavikalpalakṣaṇamuttamaṃ nirvāṇamavabodhayatīti | yaduta-
SA10n1014:1992: ato yadi tattvajñānamutyadyate tadā'numānalakṣṇā kalpanā nivṛttā satī nirāśrayā'pi nānabhyupagatā [bhavatī] |
SA10n1014:1993: ata eva bhagavatā ratnakūṭe savikalpā'pi sampratyavekṣaṇā nirvikalpajñānafalotpatteḥ kāraṇamiti [matvā] mahāfalābhinirvṛttaye kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajanitāgnerdṛṣṭāntena nirdiṣṭā |
SA10n1014:1994: [21] api ca, sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane yadyeko hetubhūto dharmo nīrdiśyate tadā nivṛtisādhakaḥ sa dharmo viruddho jāyate |
SA10n1014:1995: [22] yadyasan sa dharmastadā asato'bhāvenāsambaddhatvāt kathaṃ hi sa [ abhāvaṃ ] sādhayediti |
SA10n1014:1998: yato hyanena tāvat sadasadubhayadharmāṇāṃ paramārthatvasādhane hetorasambhavatvavocyate yuktijñaiḥ na tu niḥsvabhāvatādisāmānyadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasādhane [ sambhavatvamiti ],
SA10n1014:1999: yadi tathaiva syāttadā paraparikalpitānāmīśvarādīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane kathaṃ nāma te sarve codyā nābatariṣyantītī ?
SA10n1014:2000: tad yathā īśvarādiṣu sāmarthyavyāpyavastutvaniṣedhārthaṃ vastusvabhāve samāropaṃ ca nisedhārthaṃ asaddharmā na bhavantyasambaddhāḥ |
SA10n1014:2001: evameva paramārthataḥ kāryakārāṇādivastudharmeṣu vyāpakaniṣedhena samāropaniṣedhaṃ sādhayituṃ kathaṃ nāsmāsu sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ |
SA10n1014:2003: yato hi vastusati svabhāve na tathā kartuṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:2004: yadi asatā asambaddhatayā asāmarthaṃ tadā kutra sāmarthyaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2005: paramarthato'sadvastuni na bhavati kaścana sambandho nāma |
SA10n1014:2007: yathā sadvastuni dharmadharmibhāvādisarvāṇi vastujātāni kalpitānīti vyavasthāpyante tathā asadvastunyapi kathaṃ tāni naiva vyavasthāpyante ?
SA10n1014:2008: api ca, yadā ko'pi kadācidapi svalakṣaṇatayā bhāvatvena paramārthato naiva sidhyati,
SA10n1014:2011: atasteṣāṃ prativādo vā parīkṣaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ yujyeta,
SA10n1014:2013: sattvasya tadabhāvasya cāpi hetorānukūlyena vādiprativādinoryathāprasiddhatvena te prasiddhayavinābhūtā evoktāḥ |
SA10n1014:2014: atasteṣu dharma-dharmitvaṃ viruddhatvaṃ vyāpya-vyāpakatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryatvādīni ca yathā ābhāsante tathaiva sarvā api vyavasthā aviruddhā eva |
SA10n1014:2015: kaiścid vidvadbhiryadi darśanasyāsya dharma -dharmiviruddhādyādhāreṇa prativādaḥ kriyate tadā tatra paramārthavyavahāranayānavabodha eva kāranaṃ bhavatīti |
SA10n1014:2017: [24] tadapi na śabdamātreṇa sidhyatīti yaduktaṃ tanna duṣanamanabhyupagamāt |
SA10n1014:2022: ityevaṃ yadi vastuṣu paramārthasvabhāva eko bhavati tadā prakāradvayameva tatra bhavet hetupratyayāpekṣitatvāt sarveṣām,
SA10n1014:2027: svabhāve'smin ubhayamapi prakādvayaṃ paramārthatayā na sambhavati,
SA10n1014:2029: yadi pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā tatra sādhakapramāṇaṃ tadā vastusvabhāva eva pūrvaṃ tāvadubhābhyāṃ na siddhaḥ,
SA10n1014:2031: kintu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva tāvat pratyakṣeṇa na paramārthataḥ siddhaḥ |
SA10n1014:2034: nāpi ca tanmānasapratyakṣaṃ kutrāpi sidhyatīti tatrāmāṇyamaṅgīkriyate |
SA10n1014:2037: kintu kāryakāranabhūtasya tasyānyārthasya paramārthato jñānagrāhyatvaṃ naiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:2038: vijñāne svapratibhāsa iva yo hi jñānetarasvabhāvo'nyāvabhāsaḥ [ pratīyate ],
SA10n1014:2047: yo'pi tadākārastajjñānākārameveti viśeṣābhidhāne satyapi vijñānasadṛśyenaivānyāvabodhaḥ saṃjāyate,
SA10n1014:2050: yadi nāsti viśeṣastadā'rthakriyārthinaḥ svato vastvanudhānena samprayujyate,
SA10n1014:2054: jñānasvabhāvasāmyena ca teṣāmapi parasparaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyeta |
SA10n1014:2055: tadudbhūtatve satīti viśeṣāntaropādāne'pi anyārthasya pratyakṣatvena pratyatirasambhavaiva,
SA10n1014:2056: yato hi abhyupagamamātreṇopacaritatvād viśeṣo na prasidhyatīti |
SA10n1014:2057: anayacca, anyārtho yadi pratyakṣatvena prasidhyati tadā jñānaviśeṣastāvattatsadṛśastadudbhūto vā sādhanīyaḥ |
SA10n1014:2058: kathaṃ jñānenānyārtho gṛhyata ityevaṃ vicāryamāṇe'nyārtho yadi pratyakṣato'siddhastadā kathaṃ tāvadasiddhena svabhāvabiśeṣeṇa siddhā mārgaviśeṣāḥ setsyanta iti yāvat |
SA10n1014:2059: tadvijñānakṣaṇikatvasyāpi samanantarapratyayārthānubalenopapannatvād yathā jñānāni pūrvakṣaṇasāpekṣatayā samudbhavanti tathā janmāntarāṇyapi sambhavanti |
SA10n1014:2062: svasiddhāntānusāraṃ ca yathā taddarśanopacāraṃ kurvanti tathā pratyakṣatayā'vabhāso nāstyeva |
SA10n1014:2067: ariṣṭa-nīlākṣa-pītākṣa-timirādyapahatanetreṣu dūra-samīpasthita ekasminnapi vastuni vibhinnāni viṣamākārāṇi jñānānyutpadyante,
SA10n1014:2068: ato bāhyāvayaviviṣayakaṃ kalpanājālaṃ citte nāstyeva vidyamānam,
SA10n1014:2073: svapnādiṣu tathānīlādiguvatāmarthāntarāṇāṃ vidyamānatve'pi nīlādyābhāsijñānānāṃ pṛthaganubhavo bhrānta evaṃ,
SA10n1014:2075: ye khalu paramāṇvātmakalīādyarthānāṃ pratyakṣatvamāmanvate teṣvapi tāvat samānadoṣatāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10n1014:2089: yasthūle bhrāntaṃ tattathāgrahaṇataḥ pūrvamapi na [ abhrāntaṃ ] sidhyati,
SA10n1014:2091: purataḥ pramāṇairyadi pramāṇyaṃ sidhyati tadā yā sthule bhrāntiḥ sā grahaṇapūrvikaivaikā sidhyati,
SA10n1014:2092: yadi na tathā sidhyati tadā sā bhrāntirgṛhītetyeva na sambhavati |
SA10n1014:2099: api ca, yādyākārā yāthātathyenābhyupagamyante tadā yathā vividhānāṃ rekhādīnāṃ vistārastathā jñānākārāṇāmapi ākāravat pṛthaktvam prasajyeta |
SA10n1014:2100: siddhāntavaividhyasthāpanārtham anekajñānānāmutpādamavagacchato vijñānasya viṣayeṣu yathā prasārastathā''bhāso'sambhāva eva |
SA10n1014:2102: yadi [ākārāḥ] bhinnāstadā arthasadṛśjñānena teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate,
SA10n1014:2110: api ca, yadi jñānasādṛśayaṃ sarvātmanā bhavati,
SA10n1014:2116: yadi viparyaye hyupacārat karturekadeśa eva tadā sarvatra vastusādṛśyasambhāvanayā sarvajñātṛtvaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2118: ataḥ sādṛśyena jñānetarasvabhāvagrahaṇaṃ na [ sarvathā ] yujyate'sambhavāt |
SA10n1014:2125: yadi sa eva [ anubhavaḥ ] tadarthākārānubhavatvena gṛhyata iti cet ?
SA10n1014:2129: ' agnirmāṇavakaḥ [ bāhmaṇavaṭuḥ ] ' iti kṛte'pyupacāre naiva [tamin ] dāhapākādiḥ prayujyate |
SA10n1014:2131: pratyetavyā arthāntarāḥ sāmīpye'pi na [ jñāna- ] ākāravyāptā bhavanti,
SA10n1014:2133: atyantaparokṣatvādarthāntarāṇāṃ te [ arthāntarāḥ ] tadīyajñānākāravantaḥ santīti naiva sidhyati |
SA10n1014:2139: tadā yadi sāmīpyād vijñānenārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti kalpyate tadā sarvāṇyapi vijñānāni sarvasamīpaviṣayakāṇi syuḥ sarveṣu tatsattāyā bhedābhāvāt |
SA10n1014:2142: tataśca ' idaṃ nīlaṃ pītamidam ' iti vibhāgo naiva syāt,
SA10n1014:2145: kalpanāsvarupamātre jñānābhinnātmake sādṛśyātiriktatayā na kaścanāpi bhedo bhaviturmahati,
SA10n1014:2147: sāmīpyavaśājjñānasya yadi nārthāntarādanubhavastadā kathamiti praśne tadutpattyaiveti vaktavyaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2155: viṣayatvābhāvādevendriyaṃ na gṛhyata iti cennaitāvatā tadaviṣāyatvam ,
SA10n1014:2158: ataḥ aviṣayatvānnāsti tadviṣaya iti kathamiva vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:2170: iti yaduktaṃ tadapyasiddham sākārabuddhayā arthāntaraparicchedābhāvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniśrcāyakapramāṇābhāve,
SA10n1014:2172: anayā tāvad yuktyā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ cittamātratākāyapramukhatvāt |
SA10n1014:2175: kāryakāranabhāvastu pratyakṣasiddha iti cennaiva tad yuktimat,
SA10n1014:2178: evaṃ yadi vijñānasya grāhya-grāhakākārarahitatve'pi tasya vastusattvamabhyupagamyate tadā tatra tathā'nubhūterabhāvaḥ,
SA10n1014:2180: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarvasyaiva tathatādarśanaṃ syāditi |
SA10n1014:2181: tajjñānamapi yathā'nubhūyate na tathā sthitaṃ bhavati,
SA10n1014:2185: yadi jñānaṃ tadā naiva sā pratyakṣam,
SA10n1014:2191: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāsvabhāvaṃ tadā na tat svalakṣaṇaviṣayakam,
SA10n1014:2197: yadi sa [ grāhyagrāhakākāraḥ ] mithyā tadā tadabhinnaḥ kalpanāsvabhāvo'pi tathaiva mithyā,
SA10n1014:2198: tathātve kathaṃ sa pratyakṣa-pramāṇena bhāva-svabhāvaḥ prasidhyet |
SA10n1014:2199: yadi viśeṣo [ viśeṣyaḥ ] mithyā tadā kalpanāsvabhāvasya sāmānyasya vastutā asambhavinī,
SA10n1014:2201: tadevaṃ tattvajñānasya yathāvadanubhavābhāvānnaiva tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam |
SA10n1014:2202: svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatve'pi na hi tena jñānena kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ,
SA10n1014:2204: apekṣāviśeṣeṇa tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ parikalpyeta tathāpyarthāntaratvādapekṣāyāḥ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣābhāve sā naiva sidhyati |
SA10n1014:2205: falatastadapekṣayā vyavasthitasya tatsvabhāvasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na yuktiyuktam |
SA10n1014:2206: kāryātmakasya kāraṇātmakasya ca svabhāvasya arthāntarabhūtaṃ jñānamapi bhinnaṃ bhinnam,
SA10n1014:2208: yadyekasmin jñāne nānubhavastadā na kenāpi sambandhagrahaṇam |
SA10n1014:2209: ekajñānāvabhāse'pi ' idaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ cedam ' iti pratyakṣe na śakyamubhayoḥ sattāsambandhagrahaṇam,
SA10n1014:2213: tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayākarṣiṇā jñānenāpi paramārthatastad dvayaṃ naiva yujyate,
SA10n1014:2222: yadi pratyakṣeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvo nānubhūyate kathaṃ tadā smṛtisvabhāvo'pyutpadyeteti cenna,
SA10n1014:2226: itthaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tāvanna tasya [ kāryakāranabhāvasya ] siddhiḥ |
SA10n1014:2233: api ca, kāryahetunā'pi sa vastutvena sādhayituṃ na śakyate,
SA10n1014:2238: dharmiṇaḥ siddhāvapi paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye nāstyeva kutrāpi hetovyārptiḥ,
SA10n1014:2240: yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye ' asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī ' tyucyate,
SA10n1014:2242: taddhetukāle cāśeṣajagato vidyamānatvād ' asmin satī ' ti tasya kāraṇatā naiva sarvathā sambhāvyate |
SA10n1014:2247: kasyāpi kāryakṣaṇasya sattvaṃ kasyāpi karaṇakṣaṇasattvād yadi kalpyate tadā tatsamakālaṃ sarvasattvāntargaśeṣavidyamānakṣaṇānāmapi sattvaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2251: tathaiva taddhetukṣāsamākālaṃ sarvasattvāntargatāśeṣakṣaṇā vidyamānā yadi dṛśyante,
SA10n1014:2253: evaṃ sati teṣāṃ kathaṃ na hetutvam |
SA10n1014:2254: api ca, ' yadasti tat sat ' ityuktau tacchabdena yadyanyo hetubhūto dharmītyevaṃ gṛhyate tadā so'pi paramārthataḥ pratyakṣe naiva sidhyati,
SA10n1014:2258: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadā sato dharmasya hetutvaṃ naiva sambhavi nāpi cāsato dharmasya yaktam,
SA10n1014:2263: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadā'parasyāpi sattvaṃ naiva sidhyati,
SA10n1014:2272: api ca, yā khalu upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ sā samupalabdhifalā,
SA10n1014:2273: īdṛśonānvayena yā karyakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ tatrāpi paramārthataḥ sandehaḥ |
SA10n1014:2274: kiṃ tattvataḥ sadityataḥ sat atavā adṛśyānāṃ piśācādīnāṃ samīpavartitvāt athavā dūredeśasthitasya vastvantarasya samīpavartino balādevaṃvidhaḥ samdehaḥ |
SA10n1014:2275: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhyā deśāntarāt tadāgamanasya pūrvato vā tatsattvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate,
SA10n1014:2277: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ yādṛcchikaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2279: ye cānye tatsamarthahetavaḥ teṣāṃ nivṛttau tatfalasyāpi nivṛttau vyatirekena yā tatsiddhiruktā,
SA10n1014:2283: yathā mātṛvivāhasaṃskāravati deśe janmādānam yatra ca nāsti mātṛvivāhastatrāsat |
SA10n1014:2284: tatsamarthakāraṇāntarāṇi santītyevaṃ viśeṣābhāvānna syāt sandeha iti cet ?
SA10n1014:2287: kāryakāraṇayoḥ sandehe sati tannaiyatyārthaṃ yadyapi tatkāraṇaṃ samarthaṃ tathāpi prajñākṣetre viśeṣatastadasiddhivacanāni kathaṃ vidvadbhirnirākriyantām |
SA10n1014:2288: anvayavyatirekau vyatīricya vastuni tatsiddhiniścāyakahetūnāmabhāvāt tatrānavasthādoṣaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2289: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyate,
SA10n1014:2290: kintu sahakārivastūnāṃ pṛthaksvabhāva iva anyebhyastadutpattyāśaṅkā kathaṃ nivarteta |
SA10n1014:2293: nārvagdarśināṃ parebhya utpattiniścayasya spaṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ bhavatīti |
SA10n1014:2294: yadi parebhyo'pi tadutpattistadā na bhaved hetubhedād bheda iti cet ?
SA10n1014:2296: yadi pṛthak tadviśeṣeṣveva te sahakāripratyayā upayujyante,
SA10n1014:2301: yadi viśeṣasya pṛthagviśeṣe upacaryamāṇatvāt sa tattvānyatvābhyāṃ cintayituṃ na yujyata iti vyāharanto naiva viśeṣān vyāharanti,
SA10n1014:2302: prājñaptikasya kadācidapi hetāvayujyamānatvāt samūhamātreṇaiva tāvadutpattirvibhaktiścāpi vidhīyate,
SA10n1014:2305: na ca kāyaṃ vyatiricya samūho bhavati |
SA10n1014:2307: falataḥ paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10n1014:2309: ata ācāryaiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yathāprasiddhi siddha ityuktaḥ |
SA10n1014:2311: ityevaṃ paramārthato'nityasvabhāvam sādhayituṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10n1014:2314: nityasvabhāvamapi tāvat paramārthataḥ sādhayituṃ nāsti pramāṇam,
SA10n1014:2317: ātmādinityavastūnyapi yathā svasiddhanteṣu vijñapyante tathā pratyakṣajñāne naivāvabhāsante |
SA10n1014:2324: tasya [ vijñānasya ] vijñeyasva-bhāvānusaraṇāt saḥ [ vijñeyaḥ ] api tad [ vijñānaṃ ] anusarati,
SA10n1014:2325: anyathā tena jñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇamapi na kṛtaṃ syāt,
SA10n1014:2333: ata ātmādīnāṃ sukhādifalena saha kutrāpyanvayo na sidhyati avikalakāraṇatvena na tataḥ kādācitkasukhotpatiriti |
SA10n1014:2338: ye tāvad rupādayaḥ prasiddhadharmiṇaste'pi paramārthato'siddhā eva |
SA10n1014:2340: anupalabdhyā'pi tāvannaiva tatsattvasiddhiḥ pratiṣedhasiddhau samarthatvāt pratiṣedhamātraṃ sā sādhayatīti |
SA10n1014:2345: falataḥ vastusvabhāvaparīkṣaṇārthaṃ nāsti kimapi sādhakaṃ pramāṇamiti |
SA10n1014:2346: ataḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ paramārthataḥ sattvena sa naiva vyavaharttavyaḥ |
SA10n1014:2347: tatra tāvadayaṃ payogaḥ-yasya paramārthaḥ sādhane nasti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10n1014:2348: kalpanānirmitatvāttasya tathaiva samyaktāyā grahaṇaṃ naiva karttavyam,
SA10n1014:2350: uparyuktayorubhayoḥ samyaksvabhāvayoḥ prasiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam |
SA10n1014:2353: nāsti hetorasiddhatvamiti yaduktaṃ tat pūrvaṃ vistareṇa vicāritam |
SA10n1014:2357: tādṛśasya khalu vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya kutrāpyanvayaṃ vihāya vyatirekamātrena siddherasambhavāt |
SA10n1014:2359: yat sat tat kathamasaditi tannivṛttyā vyatirekī bhavituṃ śaknoti,
SA10n1014:2362: yadi sa svīkriyate tadā kvacittadeva saditi sadavyavahārapramāṇaṃ yat yat sattānuvidhāne prasiddhaṃ tadevāsmākaṃ vastuni prasiddhamiti cet ?
SA10n1014:2364: evaṃ sadvyavahārapramāṇavyāptamapi pramāṇamātreṇa paramārthatayā naiyatyena sadviṣayitvena naiva setsyati,
SA10n1014:2366: anyathā vṛkṣeṇāpi śiṃśapādiviśeṣā niścayeṇa jñāsyanta iti,
SA10n1014:2368: evaṃ tāvad vṛkṣastvaśeṣaviśeṣasādhāraṇatvānna tena devalādiviśeṣā nirṇetuṃ śakyāḥ |
SA10n1014:2369: pramāṇaṃ hi naiva tāvad bhāvātikrānte'parasminnapi sambhavati |
SA10n1014:2371: sarvapramāṇāni bhāvābhivyañjakāni tadvyāptapramāṇabalabhāvivyavahārapravartakānyapi pramāṇāvajñātavastumātre pravṛttatvād vṛkṣādivat kutaḥ sādhāraṇānīti cet ?
SA10n1014:2373: saṃvṛtikajagadarthaviṣayīṇyapi pramāṇani bhavantītyetad bahudhā pūrvaṃ carcitam |
SA10n1014:2377: vaktṛṇāmapi tattvaviṣeye kaścana vivādo na syāt,
SA10n1014:2381: tattvajñānārthameva taiḥ sarveṣāṃ mohāvakāśo dūrīkriyata iti |
SA10n1014:2382: lakṣaṇakārairlakṣaṇeṣu parasparavirodho bhinnasiddhāntapraveśo vā na kariṣyate,
SA10n1014:2384: ato vyavahārapramāṇaṃ yannaiva paramārthaviṣayi tadapi vyavahārapramāṇaṃ sambhavatyeva |
SA10n1014:2387: tadviṣayeṣu ' paramārthā ' iti saṃjñāpradāne'pi nāsti vivādaḥ |
SA10n1014:2388: dehadhāriṇo ye vastusvabhāvasya yathāvat parijñānena saṃsārakārāto mumukṣavasteṣāmavidyā viṣayebhyo vinivṛttavabhāvā,
SA10n1014:2390: abhīṣṭārthakriyāsādhakarthaprāptimātreṇa puruṣā naiva muktāḥ syuḥ sarvasya muktiprasaṅgāt |
SA10n1014:2391: ataḥ avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ pramāṇamiti yaduktaṃ tat pramāṇasādhāraṇalakṣaṇam |
SA10n1014:2393: ataḥ kathaṃ tasmin samyag vastu aviparītatayā setsyati |
SA10n1014:2395: [26-29] ye tāvat paramārthataḥ svaparobhayāhetukato'nutpannāsteṣāṃ samyaktayā niḥsvabhāvatvāt,
SA10n1014:2397: yāni tāvat svato vā parato vā aviparītayā sadvastūni,
SA10n1014:2400: yato ye tāvat sāṃkhyādayaste hetuṃ satkāryaṃ vyavasthāpayanti |
SA10n1014:2401: svata eva vastūni jāyanta iti bruvāṇā naiva yuktisaṅgatāḥ |
SA10n1014:2402: na hi sad vā asad vā vastu svataḥ svahetau niṣpadyate |
SA10n1014:2406: falataḥ ko hi nāma kasyotpādakaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2409: tadātmanā siddho'pi viśeṣābhāvāt kastāvat kasyotpādakaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2414: yadi sa svabhāvena siddhastadā tasmin aṇumātramapi upakāryasvabhāvasyābhāvāt kathaṃ sa utpādyaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2415: aviśeṣaṇīyatve'pi yadyutpādyatvamahetukatāyāmupakalpyate tadā sajjñānamapi tathaiva kiṃ na parikalpyate |
SA10n1014:2417: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ “ābhyātmikāyatanāni na svata utpannāni,
SA10n1014:2419: sajjñānavat“ ityasmin prasaṅge prāṅgārthamaviditvā kecana [ prayoge ] asmin dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiṃ,
SA10n1014:2422: ityaṃ pareṣu parasparavirodhaṃ pratipādayiṣayā pareṣu siddhāni sajjñānādīni tāvadudāhriyante |
SA10n1014:2431: pariniṣpannabhāvātmakatve'pi yadi tadupakāraḥ svīkriyate tadā tadbhinnaḥ sa upakāro na svata utpadyate,
SA10n1014:2433: yadyabhinnastadopakārasyāpi tathaiva siddhatvāt sa kathamiva setsyati |
SA10n1014:2435: api ca, yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvo'yaṃ vṛkṣadrumavat paryāyatayocyate tadā na tathā lokaprasiddhiriti |
SA10n1014:2438: yadi hetvabhivyaktau vipariṇāme vā sati falaṃ bhavatīti nirdiśyate tadā evamayaṃ pṛthagvyasthitaḥ saddhetureva |
SA10n1014:2440: yato hi sa yadi abhivyaktervipariṇāmasya vā'vabhāso niścayena tadbhinnastadā kevalādanyasmādutpattirevābhyupagatā syāt |
SA10n1014:2441: yadi nāsti bhinnastadā kāryakāraṇaviplavadoṣaḥ prasaktaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2444: parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇadharmasya itarapratiṣedhakatvād anyatrāsiddhatvācca anubhayapakṣakalpanamapi naiva yuktīmat |
SA10n1014:2445: api ca, yadyabhīṣṭe taddhetau abhīṣṭaṃ vastu ātmanaḥ purvasvabhāvamaparityajya abhivyaktādyavasthāṃ prāpnoti tadā avasthāvikṛtiprasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:2448: yadi parityajyeti pakṣastadā niraṃśasvabhāvatvāt kaścidapyanvayasvabhāvo na syāt |
SA10n1014:2451: api ca, vyaktamapyanābhāsitaṃ saditaralakṣaṇatvād itarābhyāmabhivyaktipariṇāmābhyāṃ prabhāvitatvāt parikalpitameva |
SA10n1014:2456: etadaviparītatvena paricchede sati na tat paricchedayogyaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2457: yasya paricchedakāle yo vicchedyo na bhavati,
SA10n1014:2459: ye parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇāste ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva yuktarupāḥ,
SA10n1014:2466: ataḥ yo hi vastubhedaḥ prāgavasthāvilakṣaṇaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10n1014:2474: iṣyamāṇe'pi copalabdhisvabhāve prāgvat paścādapi anupalabdhaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2477: dugdhādīnāṃ śatadhā vināśe'pi yā hi dadhyādirupeṇa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ,
SA10n1014:2479: api ca, yaḥ kaścid dṛḍharupeṇa bhāvasvabhāvastatsya kathamanyathā vikārānubhavaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2480: yadi sa tāavadadṛḍhasvabhāvastadā'pi bhaṅguratvānniranvayaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ syāditi tasyāpyanyathā vikārānubhavo naiva syāt |
SA10n1014:2481: ato'bhivyakteḥ pariṇāmasya cāyujyamānatvād yā hi tābhyāṃ svata utpattiparikalpanā,
SA10n1014:2483: yadi ākasmikī tavat svata utpattistathāpi yaddhi vastūnāṃ deśakālasvabhāvaniyatattvam,
SA10n1014:2485: nirapekṣeṣu tāvad vastuṣu tathāvidhā naiyatyāmbhāvanā naiva yuktimatī |
SA10n1014:2486: yadi hi parasāpekṣatvaṃ tadā parata utpattiḥ syāt,
SA10n1014:2487: na hi upakārābhāve apekṣā nomopapadyate sā'pi paścānniṣetsyata iti |
SA10n1014:2488: apekṣāyā api tāvat sadā saṃnihitasvabhāvatvāt sarvadaivotpattiprasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:2489: ityevaṃ vyavahāre'pi tāvat svata utpādo'sambhava eva |
SA10n1014:2492: tadā sa [ parākhyaḥ pratyayaḥ ] nityo vā bhaved, anityo va |
SA10n1014:2497: falataḥ kathaṃ nāma tasmāt kramaśo'rthakriyā sampasyate ?
SA10n1014:2505: asattve'pi tatpratibaddhātmabhāvasya prāpyamāṇatvād buddhiparikalpitā apekṣā tāvad vyavasthāpyate,
SA10n1014:2506: kintu tadabhinirhārāya yo hi apratisāmarthyavān hetuḥ,
SA10n1014:2507: sa eva tasyānupakārakatvāt [ sā ] tadapekṣitā bhavati,
SA10n1014:2509: ato nityatvena yadabhīṣṭaṃ vastu sadaivopakaroti tadapratihatasamarthyaṃ hetuṃ parityajya kathamanyān apekṣiṣyate ?
SA10n1014:2513: yena tebhya utpattimasvīkurvadbhirbalena “ naivotpādyante“ ityevam ātmabalopadarśanaṃ kariṣyate, nānyatra |
SA10n1014:2515: evameva kāryāṇi yadi hetudharmān nānusaranti tadā tadabhinnatvaprasaṅgaḥ syādeveti |
SA10n1014:2517: akramādapi hetoḥ kramiṇaḥ kāryasyotpādo na virudhyatīti cet ?
SA10n1014:2519: yataḥ ' kāryāṇi sarvān hetudharmān nānuvidadhate ' ityevaṃ tatkathanaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2522: kimapi kāryaṃ nityasya vastano vyatirekaṃ naivānuvidhatte,
SA10n1014:2526: avikale'pi kadācit kāryotpādābhāvāt yad yatra anvayavyatirekau nānuvidhatte,
SA10n1014:2529: sataḥ kāryasya tāvat [ kvacidapi ] apekṣā naiva yujyate,
SA10n1014:2532: itthaṃ nitye tāvat kramaśo'rthakriyā na yujyate,
SA10n1014:2534: yato hi tasya tathāvidhārthakriyāyā vinaṣṭasvabhāvamanusṛtya kāryotpattirvā tadviyogo vā na yujyate |
SA10n1014:2535: yadi tatsāmarthyasvabhāvaṃ paścatkāle'pi anusarati tadāpi tena sarvāṇi kāryāṇi yāni pūrvotpannani tāni naiva punarutpādayituṃ śakyante,
SA10n1014:2537: yadanyat tatsadṛśaṃ tatkathaṃ notpadyata iti virodhaparīkṣā'pi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10n1014:2541: tata utpādyasya kāryasya anutpattāvapi tadutpattisāmarthyasvabhāvānusaraṇaṃ pratihataṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2542: yo yadā yadutpādayati tadā tasmin apratihatasāmarthyaṃ bhavatīti kathanaṃ naiva yuktimattaram |
SA10n1014:2543: tasmādayaṃ pūrvamapi paścātkāla iva anutpādaka eva syāt,
SA10n1014:2545: tataśca paścātkāle'pi pūrvavad utpādaka eva syāt |
SA10n1014:2546: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā viruddhadharmayogād asmaikatvahāniḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2551: ato parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo virodhāntaro na sidhyatīti cet ?
SA10n1014:2556: ataḥ kalpakalpāntareṣu aviśeṣatayā sthitatvāt pūrvavat paścādapi tasya vināśo naiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:2558: yathā te atītādapi vipākahetoḥ kāryotpattiṃ varṇayanti,
SA10n1014:2561: evaṃvidha upacāro vā vartamānakriyākramo vā atītāddhetorbhavatīti vādo naiva sarvathā yuktaḥ,
SA10n1014:2563: yadi tata utpattiraṅgīkriyate tadā ahetuta eva syāt |
SA10n1014:2566: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā vartamāna iva anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvāt kathaṃ hi sa atīta iti |
SA10n1014:2571: evaṃ sati vinaṣṭāyāḥ kriyātaḥ kāryotpattirnaiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:2573: kathaṃ hi kāryotpattau kriyamāṇāyāṃ kriyāvināśa iti |
SA10n1014:2574: ekasvabhāvātmake vastuni kriyāvanti akriyāvanti ca kāryāṇi na yujyate,
SA10n1014:2580: anyathā pūrvavat paścādapi sā tathā bhavituṃ na śaktā syāt |
SA10n1014:2581: api ca, kriyā nāma sā kiṃ samarthasvabhāvā yaduta karmasvabhāvā ?
SA10n1014:2582: yadi tat svabhāvadvayaṃ vastunaḥ sakāśād bhinnaṃ tadā kathaṃ nāma tad [ vastu ] vinaṣṭamityabhidhātuṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:2583: yadi tadupahatasvabhāvaṃ tadā samastavastuno nityasattāvādasya hāniḥ prasajyate |
SA10n1014:2584: arthāntaravināśe satyapi vastuno hyacalasvabhāvasya vināśo naiva sidhyati |
SA10n1014:2585: yathā mṛte'pi devadatte yajñadattasya anupahatasvabhāvātma-katvānmṛta sa iti vaktuṃ na śakyate |
SA10n1014:2590: tasyāmapi tulya eva virodhaḥ parīkṣā ca |
SA10n1014:2592: anyārthatve sati kriyāyāḥ vastu tāvad ahetukameva syāt,
SA10n1014:2596: anyārthakriyāntarobhayasvabhāvātmakatvād yadi vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā svabhāvata evotpādayati tadā vastvapi tathaivotpādakaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2598: arthāntarasya pakṣatve anyārthakalpanāyām anavasthādoṣānnaiva [ kadāpi ] hetutvaṃ sidhyet |
SA10n1014:2599: vastūpakārābhāvād 'asyeyaṃ kriyā'-iti sambandha eva na siddhaḥ syād,
SA10n1014:2601: upakārakatvameva yadi vastutvenāṅgīkriyate tadā kriyātmakatvād vastunaḥ,
SA10n1014:2602: kriyāmupakarotīti cettadā kāryamapi kathaṃ na tathaivopakaroti ?
SA10n1014:2604: yadi kriyā hi sanmātravastusāpekṣaiva tadā avikalahetutvāt sadā talsamīpavartinī eva,
SA10n1014:2606: yadi sā arthantarabhūtā tadā sambandhastāvadasiddha eva |
SA10n1014:2607: kriyāṇāmeva parasparayogād vastu tāavad gauṇameva sthāsyapi |
SA10n1014:2608: kṣaṇikasya [ vastunaḥ ] utpādasamanantarameva asthāyitvāt [ tasya kasyāmapi ] kriyāyāṃ karmasvabhāvatvaṃ naiva yujyate ye tāvadakṣaṇikāste sadā ekasvabhāvatvenāvasthitvānnaiva kriyāvanta ākāśavat |
SA10n1014:2609: ataḥ keṣvapi ' karma kriyate' iti na sidhyati |
SA10n1014:2616: vastunaḥ svasvabhāva iva kriyāyā api avināśaprasaṅge sati kriyāyā naiva [ kadāpi ] vināśaḥ sidhyati |
SA10n1014:2617: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve'nabhidheyeti sati kriyāyā naiva [ kadāpi ] vināśaḥ sidhyati |
SA10n1014:2618: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve'nabhidheyeti kalpyate tadā prajñaptisattvāt sā avastveva |
SA10n1014:2626: yadi aprāptakriyastāvadanāgata ityucyate tadā tadānīṃ tasmādapi kāryotpattiḥ ātyantikatayā naiva yuktimatī,
SA10n1014:2628: yadi vastu sarvadā vidyamānaṃ tadā tasyāḥ prāpteravikalakāraṇānāṃ sadbhāve'pi kimiva kriyā naiva prāpyate |
SA10n1014:2629: nāpi kriyā vastunaḥ sakāśādarthāntarabhūteti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭatvāt |
SA10n1014:2630: yadi nāsti arthāntarabhūtā tadā kriyāvat svabhāvo'pi naiva aprāptaḥ syādabhinnatvāt |
SA10n1014:2632: vastunaḥ svabhāva iva tadabhinnā kriyā'pi sarvadā sadeva,
SA10n1014:2636: yadi tataḥ [ vartamanāt ] kāryaṃ samutpadyate tadā samakālaṃ vā samutpadyatām,
SA10n1014:2639: kāryotpattitaḥ pūrvaṃ śaśaśṛṅganibhād asatkāraṇād utpādo naiva yuktaḥ |
SA10n1014:2640: yasmin kāle ca hetorātmabhāvaḥ [ kāryotpadane ] samarthastasmin kāle kāryasyāpi samakālaṃ sattvāt siddhameva tat [ kāryam ] iti |
SA10n1014:2641: atastasmin [karye] sa hetuḥ kamapi vyāpāraṃ naiva karoti |
SA10n1014:2644: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā kāryakāraṇabhāvasyaiva bhaṅgaḥ syāditi |
SA10n1014:2645: viṣama [ bhinna ] kālamiti pakṣo'pi naiva sambhavati evameva yadi kāryaṃ [ utpādāt ] pūrvameva sat syāt tadā'nāgatotpādaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2646: ayamapi tāvat [ pakṣaḥ ] naiva yujyata ityuktapūrvamasmābhiḥ |
SA10n1014:2647: yadi [ kāryaṃ ] kṣaṇāntaravyavadhānenotpadyate tadā tadatītādevotpadyata iti naiva yuktamityuktapūrvam |
SA10n1014:2654: atra bhagavatā'pi-“ asmin satīdaṃ bhavati “ iti kāryakaraṇabhāvasya nirdeśāt kalpanātrayaṃ vivarjya caturthī svīkriyate |
SA10n1014:2655: tāḥ kalpanāḥ punaḥ - kāraṇat pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vā,
SA10n1014:2659: tatra yattavat pūrvameva sthitaṃ bhavati na tad hetau sati jāyate,
SA10n1014:2662: tasmin kāle tasya [ kāryasya ] api satvāt |
SA10n1014:2669: ityaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe vidyamānaṃ kāryameva hetoḥ samutpadyate,
SA10n1014:2671: tato'vyavahite dvitīye kṣaṇe kāryasattāyā anubhavārtham-“ asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī“ tyuktam |
SA10n1014:2675: prathame kṣaṇe kāraṇasya avinaṣṭātvāt tadavyavadhānenaiva ca kāryasyotpādāt |
SA10n1014:2679: vidyamānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kālāntarāvyavahitaṃ ca kāryaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate,
SA10n1014:2681: [ evaṃ ca sati ] samakālikatvaprasaṅgaḥ syānnaveti vicāraṇīyatāmarhati |
SA10n1014:2682: niraṃśe tāvad vastuni kālāntareṇāvyavahite ca sati samakālikatvaṃ muktvā nānyā gatiḥ sambhavati,
SA10n1014:2684: yadi nāsti madhye kālāntarāstitvaṃ tadā avaśyaṃ pūrvāparatoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ saṃsparśaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2685: tathā ca sati sarveṣāṃ [ kṣaṇānāṃ ] ekasminneva kṣaṇe samanupraveśaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2686: [ falataḥ ] yathā paramāṇoḥ sarvātmanā saṃyoge piṇḍasya aṇumātratāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10n1014:2688: yathā khalu deśakramaḥ pramāṇairavabhāsamānatvāt saṃvṛtau svīkriyata tathā kālakramo'pio tatsadṛśa eva,
SA10n1014:2690: tatra prayogaḥ-ye sarvātmanā kālāntareṇāvyavahitāsteṣu pūrvāparakālabhedo na sambhavati,
SA10n1014:2696: falataḥ antimakālalakṣaṇasya kṣaṇasyāpi [ svarupatā- ] hāniḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2698: abhāvena ca saha sarvātmanā vā ekadeśena vā avyavahitatvamiti cintā na pravartata iti cet ?
SA10n1014:2700: tayormadhye kasyā api kālāntarasadbhāvasambhāvanāyā abhāvānnaiva tadā hetvabhāvayogaḥ sambhavati |
SA10n1014:2704: na tu vartamānāt [ vartamānasya tadānīm ] asattvāt,
SA10n1014:2706: yadi tad vartamānaṃ tadā [ tasya ] asattven saha virodha āpadyate |
SA10n1014:2707: yadi tat sadityabhyupeyate tadā avyavahitatvadicintā kathaṃ na pravṛtā syāt |
SA10n1014:2709: kintu kāryasattākāle tadasaditi hetoḥ avyavahitatvādicintā naiva kāryeti cet ?
SA10n1014:2712: itthaṃ tu bhavantaḥ kāraṇasya nirantaratve satkāryasyotpattiṃ varṇayanti |
SA10n1014:2715: nirantaratvam avyavahitvaṃ saṃspṛṣṭatvamityādīnāmabhinnārthakatvāt tadabhyupagamasāmarthyena kāryakāraṇaikatvamapyabhyupagataṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2717: api ca, vinaṣṭahetoḥ kāryotpattiprasaṅgasya ayujyamānatvād bhavantastaṃ [ pakṣaṃ ] parityajya vartamānahetoravyavadhānena kāryotpattimabhyupagacchanti |
SA10n1014:2718: tatra tāvat kiṃ sarvātmanā kāryotpattiṃ svīkurvanti yaduta ekadeśeneti cintā pravṛttaiva syāt,
SA10n1014:2721: tatra ca ye nāpyekadeśena na ca sarvātmaneti bruvanti,
SA10n1014:2722: tena taiḥ kimucyata iti vicāryamāṇe avyavahitamapi nāpyavyavahitamiti kathanaṃ paryavasyet |
SA10n1014:2724: api ca, yadi vidyamānakāryakāle kāraṇaṃ nāstyeva,
SA10n1014:2725: tadā ' avinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kāryamutpadyata' iti naiva kathanīyam,
SA10n1014:2727: yasmin kāle kāraṇam avinaṣṭaṃ tasmin kāle kāryamapi nāsti,
SA10n1014:2729: evaṃ cintyate-svayaṃ vināśavyavahite'pi vastuni nāsti samakālikatvam,
SA10n1014:2731: tathaivātrāpi kāryakāranayorasamīcīnarupatve'pi samakālikatvaṃ nāstītyayaṃ vicāraprakāro na yujyate,
SA10n1014:2733: evaṃ tatra sadasadbhāve yadyekadeśenāvyavahitatvaṃ tadā avayavisadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:2735: tathaiva chāyātapayorudakadharāyāṃ cāpi yadi sarvātmanā'vyavahitatvaṃ tadaikadeśatvameva syāt |
SA10n1014:2737: asmākaṃ tu [ mate ] sarva evāyaṃ sadasadbhāvaḥ paramārthato'siddhaḥ,
SA10n1014:2739: avyavahitatvādisamudbhūto'sadbhāva iti nāsti kaścana vyavahārastathāpi dvipīye kṣaṇe vastūni svasvabhāvanirodhamātraṃ prajñapayanti |
SA10n1014:2744: kāryakāraṇayostu paramārthataḥ sattvabhyupagamād ekadeśenāvyavahitatvādicintā tāvat pravartata eva |
SA10n1014:2745: āryaśālistambasūtre yo hi bhagavatā tulādaṇḍopamayā avyavahitatvena kāryakāraṇabhāvo'bhihitaḥ,
SA10n1014:2760: laṅkāvatārādisūtreṣu bhagavatā kāryakāraṇabhāvaniṣedhastāvat sāṃvṛtakāryakāraṇeṣvevāvagantavyaḥ yadapi bhagavatā ' asmin satīdaṃ bhavati' ityuktaṃ tena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthaṃ eva vikalpo'bhyupagamyata iti yaduktaṃ tad vakṣyate kiṃ ' asmin satīdaṃ bhavati' iti vacanena vikalpatrayaṃ niṣidhya caturthavikalpābhyupagam āgamena nirdiṣṭo yaduta yuktyā ?
SA10n1014:2763: yato hi yau chāyāṅkurau dīpaprakāśau vā samakālavidyamānau tāvapi dīpe sati prakāśo bhavatīti na vyavahāraviruddhau |
SA10n1014:2766: yadi hi vastutvaṃ pramāṇāntaraiḥ paramārthataḥ kṣaṇikatvena sādhyate tadā tadapi parikalpitamātrameva,
SA10n1014:2768: itthaṃ tu loke'pi samakālikaṃ chāyāṅkurādikamapi kāryakāraṇabhāvena jñāyata eva |
SA10n1014:2774: yato hi yathā yuktyā vikalpatrayaṃ na sambhavati tathā caturtho'pi vikalpaḥ paramārthato naiva sambhavatīti [ pūrvaṃ ] vistarena nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:2775: lokaprasiddhimatikramya nityatva-dravyatva svātantryādiguṇopetamātmānamabhyupetamātmānamabhyupetya karmafāsambandhādisaṃvṛtiṃ nirākurvatāṃ dṛṣṭiparihārārthaṃ bhagavaduktena idampratyayatāmātreṇevāvasthiteṣu saṃvṛtimāśritya asmin satīdaṃ bhavatītyuktam,
SA10n1014:2776: na tvāgamena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthavikalpāśrayaṇaṃ kalpanīyam |
SA10n1014:2778: falataśca sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ māyeva prajñāptyā utpādādibhya eva santuṣyatām ,
SA10n1014:2784: ato ye ācāryāḥ “ na paramārthata adhyātmikānyāyatanāni praratyayataḥ samutpadyante,
SA10n1014:2792: vyavahāre parataḥ siddhatvānnastyasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇasyāpi [ bhavanmate paramārthataḥ ] samyagvastutvāddhetvādīnāṃ na vyavahāraḥ kutrāpi sidhyatīti nirdiṣṭaṃ pūrvam |
SA10n1014:2794: tairthikāḥ ye hi parādivyavahāravaśāt parādīni santīti kathayanti tān ācārya āha-
SA10n1014:2795: “ na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate“
SA10n1014:2798: parādayaḥ śabdā ye tāvatprajñāptigocarāstānapi paramparayā vastusaṃsargiṇa ityabhidadhatāṃ teṣāṃ ' vastusabhāvaḥ pratyayeṣvastītyutpadyate' ityumamabhiprāyamādāya dūṣaṇaṃ pradattam,
SA10n1014:2799: pratyayādiṣu sattve paramārthato vastusvabhāvasyānutpādāditi vistareṇa khalvabhihitam |
SA10n1014:2800: ato yadā sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthataḥ parata utpādo naivopapadyate tadā pratyayādibhyo'pi anutpādādasiddha eva |
SA10n1014:2801: ato nāstyeva paramārthataḥ śabdasaṃsargi kimapi vastu |
SA10n1014:2802: falato'siddhe'pyevaṃvidhe vyavahāre vastu tāvadabādhitameveti yaduktaṃ tanna yujyate |
SA10n1014:2803: [ 30 ] ye sāṃkhyādayaḥ pradhāneśvarādikaṃ manvānāḥ pradhāneśvarādibhyo vastūnāmutpādamabhyupagacchanti,
SA10n1014:2804: teṣāmapi mataṃ svato vā parato vā utpādapakṣe pṛthakpṛtham doṣābhidhānānnaiva yuktarupamiti |
SA10n1014:2805: anye ye kadācit svātantryena ubhayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti ,
SA10n1014:2807: apare ca ye tāvat-' ubhayātmakasya vastunaḥ pramāṇaviruddhatvānna ko'pi tadabhyupagacchatīti hetoḥ ubhayata utpattiṃ dūṣayitvā bhavantaḥ kevalamātmānameva mohayanti,
SA10n1014:2809: te tāvad vidvāṃsaḥ svayaṃ śāstrāṇāmaparijñānāt śabdārthayośca samyaganavagamāt [ kevalaṃ ] śabdaśa upahasanti |
SA10n1014:2810: kecana tāvat kaṇṭakāditīkṣṇatādṛṣṭāntena sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato'hetuta utpadyanta iti kathayanti,
SA10n1014:2811: tatra vastūnāṃ paramārthato'hetuta utpattiṃ sādhayatāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntastāvannaiva siddhaḥ,
SA10n1014:2816: anenaiva teṣāṃ taikṣṇyādīnāmapi niścitatvānna ko'pi [ dharmaḥ ] ahetuta utpadyate |
SA10n1014:2817: evaṃ kādācitkatvāt sarveṣāmeteṣāṃ vastūnāṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ niścitameva anapekṣitasya tu sadā aviśeṣāttasya kādācitkatvaṃ nopapadyata eveti |
SA10n1014:2822: ahetukatve sati sarvatra abhinnatvāt kaṇkādiṣvapi tīkṣṇatāyā nirdhāraṇaṃ na syāt |
SA10n1014:2824: ye bījādayaste loke kāryakāraṇātmakatvena pratyakṣataḥ siddhāḥ |
SA10n1014:2826: api ca, hetutaḥ sādyasya sādhanāvasare anyataḥ [hetataḥ ] utpatteḥ [ siddheḥ,
SA10n1014:2831: ato'hetuvādī khalu vyavahāre pratyakṣādibhirbādhitatvād vidvadbhiḥ sāvadhānatayā pariharttavya eva |
SA10n1014:2833: te yathā avicāraramaṇīyatvena prasiddhāstathā teṣāmaniṣedhād anutpattirityucyate,
SA10n1014:2839: atasteṣu vyāpterutpatteḥ samyaṅ nivṛttyā tasyāpi [ sasvabhāvatvasya ] nivṛttiḥ |
SA10n1014:2843: sā khalu [ utpattiḥ ] tadvijñāne tathaivāvabhāsata ityapi kathanamyuktam,
SA10n1014:2845: tatrāpi paramārthatastathākāro naiva sambhavīti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:2847: tadutpattyā sasvabhāvatvādīnāṃ vyaptatve'pi utpattau satyāṃ samyaksvabhāvo naiva niyatarūpeṇa sidhyati,
SA10n1014:2848: vyāpakasāmīpye sarvavyāpyāṇāṃ sāmīpyaṃ navaśyaṃbhāvīti niścitamityuktameva pūrvam |
SA10n1014:2850: paramarthato na kasminnapyutpattiḥ pravartata iti sādhitameva |
SA10n1014:2851: yanna kaiścidapi pratyayaiḥ samutpadyate tad vastu kutaḥ prādurbhavatīti kathayadbhirabhivyaktimātrameva ato'naikāntika eva heturiti cet tatasyāpi pūrvaṃ nirākṛtatvāt tyājyamevaitaditi |
SA10n1014:2852: atha pratyayairvastu abhivyajyata eveti cettadā ki sā abhivyaktiḥ svalakṣaṇopacayasvabhāvā vā tadāvaraṇasaṃkṣayātmiokā vā indriyaiḥ sukṛtā vā tadviṣayakavijñānotpattilakṣaṇā veti vicāraḥ samupajāyante |
SA10n1014:2853: tatra naiva tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kathamapi yujyate,
SA10n1014:2855: yadā anupacayasvabhāvaḥ svato vinaśya abhivyañcakapratyayairutpadyate tadā ekasyāparasyānupacayasvabhāvasyotpādavaśāt svalakṣaṇopacayo bhavatīti cet ?
SA10n1014:2856: na, tatpūrvasvabhāvo yadi na nirudhyeta tadā dvau parasparāvirudhau upacayāpacayasvabhāvau niryuktitayā ekasminneva svīkāryau syātām |
SA10n1014:2857: yadyapūrvaḥ kaścana svabhāvo notpadyate tadā abhivyañcakāḥ pratyayāstāvannirarthakaḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1014:2863: tadā sarve te pratyayā ye yadā arthamabhivyañcinti tadā ananyārthabhūtā kriyā tatra naiva sambhavati,
SA10n1014:2865: nityasya bhāvasya tvāvaraṇaṃ tadviśeṣāṇāmavināśād anutpādācca kadāpi na yujyate,
SA10n1014:2870: yadi nāsti sa samartho vā svavijñānavijñeyo vā tadā svahetuvikalatayā tadvijñānotpattireva na syāt |
SA10n1014:2872: yathā āvaraṇasaṃkṣaye tathā vijñānotpattāvapi avighnāpādanasvabhāvo'pi kriyāyāṃ naiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:2873: asāmarthyāt tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvābhāvācca abhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayairāvaraṇaṃ kriyata ityasyāpi nirākaraṇaṃ kṛtameva [ pūrvam ] |
SA10n1014:2875: yadi sāmarthayamabhyupagamyate tadā āvaraṇakārake satyapi avikalahetoḥ sadbhāvāt sadaiva vijñānotpattisambhavād vyañjakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ kriyā nirarthikaiva syāt |
SA10n1014:2876: ato nityasya tāvadakiñcikaratvāt kathamapyāvaraṇaṃ na yujyate |
SA10n1014:2877: anityatā tu kadāpi kenāpi hetuviśeṣeṇa vijñānānutpādakasyānyasya kṣaṇasyotpādād āvriyata eva |
SA10n1014:2879: yadi tatsukṛtvaṃ [ vastu- ]- svabhāvabhūtaṃ tadā anityātāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10n1014:2881: yadi tadanyārthabhūtaṃ tadā sukṛtatvaṃ naiva yuktiyuktam,
SA10n1014:2884: kasminnapi vastuni kenāpi kimapi karaṇaṃ tāvannaiva sambhavamiti [ pūrvaṃ ] nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:2885: indriyaiḥ sukṛtatve'pi yadi abhivyañcakairbhāvaiḥ tadindriyavijñānotpādāsāmarthyam athavā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvāsattvaṃ tadā tadvijñānotpattirasambhavinī,
SA10n1014:2887: yadi vidyata eva sāmarthyaṃ tadvijñeyasvabhāvo vā tadā indriyaiḥ sukṛtakatvataḥ pūrvameva tasmin [ viṣaye ] vijñānotpādasya prasañgaḥ syāt,
SA10n1014:2889: atastamin viṣaye vijñānotpādalakṣaṇamapi na saṅgataṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:2890: yato hyevaṃ tad vyaṅgyaṃ vastvapi yadi asamarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyavabhāvaṃ vā'pi nāsti tadā vijñānotpāde'pi na pad [ vastu ] tasya [ vijñānasya ] viṣayaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:2891: yadi [ tad vastu ] samarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvaṃ vā syāt tadā svasvabhāvavat sāmīpyāt tatsattāmatreṇaiva vijñānasya samutpādo bhaviṣyatītyato na tena vyañjakavijñānotpādaḥ kriyata iti [ sidhyati ] |
SA10n1014:2892: api ca, bhavatāṃ tāvanmate sarvesāṃ vastūnāṃ jāyataḥ sadaivāvatiṣṭhanta iti hetostatra [ vastuṣu ] vyaṅgya-vyañjakādīnāmapi sadā avasthitatvāt |
SA10n1014:2893: [ nityatvāt ] vyaṅgya-vyañjakādivyavasthā naiva [ samīcīnatayā sarvathā ] yujyate,
SA10n1014:2898: nityasya ca sarvasāmarthyavirahiotatvānnaiva hi vastutvaṃ kathamapyupapadyate |
SA10n1014:2904: te'pi kramayogapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt sarvasāmarthyaśūnyā eveti pūrvamapi [ bahudhā ] nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:2910: ityevaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo ye sarvasāmarthyaśūnyāsteṣāṃ vandhyāputrādyabhinnatve'pi ye khalu tān vastutvena parikalpayanti ,
SA10n1014:2913: pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo yadi kasyāpi jñānasya viṣayāstadā avaśyaṃ te hetutvenaṅgīkaraṇīyāḥ,
SA10n1014:2918: anupakāritve'pi yadi vijñānena vijñeyasvabhāvasya abhāvād viṣayatvaṃ kalpyate,
SA10n1014:2919: tathā sati yadi vijñānaṃ vijñeyasvabhāvamanusaratīti tadā tadvijñānasyāpi tadanusaraṇena nityatāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:2921: yadi sarvajñajñānaṃ taditi na kasyāpi vastunaḥ sāmīpyamiti kalpyate,
SA10n1014:2924: yena kāraṇena tato vibhaktaṃ śaśaśṛṅgādiṃ ye jñeyatvenopacaranti,
SA10n1014:2929: vandhyāputrādisadṛśe tadabhitnne'pi yadi vastviti nāma prajñapyate,
SA10n1014:2931: kintuṃ kathaṃ vandhyāputrādayo'hetukā iti nocyata ityucyate |
SA10n1014:2940: yadi tāni kramaśa ekasiddhinisedhāmyām aparaniṣedhasiddhibhāñji na syustadā asadeva syuḥ |
SA10n1014:2941: falata ekasya niṣedha evāparasya siddhiriti hetoḥ kathaṃ tāvadanabhidheyaṃ vastvityabhidhīyate |
SA10n1014:2942: anyathā [ yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā ] anabhidheyatvāt sarvāṇyeva vastunyanabhidheyāni syuḥ |
SA10n1014:2943: falataḥ svaparoditānām aśeṣavastuviśeṣāṇāṃ vilopasambhavād mahātmabhirvajrakaṇādiyukticatuṣṭayasyābhidhād ebhyo mārgebhyo naiva viruddham | yathoktam-
SA10n1014:2944: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ |
SA10n1014:2945: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana ||iti ||
SA10n1014:2946: ityevaṃ sarve dharmā nirātmāna iti sādhyante |
SA10n1014:2947: ata eva bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāsūtre vastuṣu nityānityagrāhasya tāvanniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ |
SA10n1014:2952: yadā tad rūpaṃ sadeva nāsti tadā tannityābhidhānasya tu kathaiva kā ? ityuktam |
