SA10n1014:3261: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve'pi vastuno yadi niyatadeśakālādyavabhāso bhavatīti kathaṃ na śaśaśṛṅgādayo'pyavabhāsanta iti cet ?
SA10n1014:3263: yato hi keśādivanmithyāvabhāse'pi kimiti keśādīnāmeva mithyāvabhāsaḥ,
SA10n1014:3265: yadi timirādihetupratyayādīnāṃ pratīniyatasāmarthyena tathā pratiniyatatvamityucyeta tadā asadvastuni kathaṃ nāma hetupratyayādīnāṃ pratiniyatasāmarthyamiti kathayituṃ śakyate |
SA10n1014:3267: tadā tathaiva apareṣvapi pratiniyatahetupratyayatvena pratiniyatasāmarthye'pi kimiti naiva tathā vyavasthā svīkriyate |
SA10n1014:3269: tathā sati taimirikadṛṣṭakeśādīnāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi pūrvamevāveditam |
SA10n1014:3270: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā taimirikairadhyālambitānāṃ mithyākeśāṃdīnāṃ hetupratyayā api kathaṃ nāma niyatāḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1014:3271: taimirikakeśādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvenāpi satyatvaṃ naiva yujyata iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:3272: api ca, yadi jñānasvabhāvaḥ satyatvena siddhaṃ syāttadā keśādayo na tato bhinnā iti teṣāmapi satyatvenāvabodhaḥ syāt,
SA10n1014:3274: keśādayastu mithyātvena lokena pramāṇena ca siddhā eva |
SA10n1014:3275: ato jñānamapi keśādimithyāsvabhāvenābhinnatvāt tathaiva mithyāmātramiti kathaṃ keśādīnāṃ tatsvabhāvatvena satyatvaṃ syāditi |
SA10n1014:3276: yathā sarvaṇi vastūni paramārthato'nutpannāni tathaiva saṃvṛtāvapyutpannāni bhavituṃ na śaknuvanti,
SA10n1014:3277: tathā hi-ye tāvat paramārthato'nutpannāsteṣāṃ saṃvṛtāvapi notpādaḥ,
SA10n1014:3278: yathā-śaśaśṛṅgādaya iti ye bruvanti teṣāṃ māyādibhiranaikāntikatvam,
SA10n1014:3282: ataḥ paramārthato'sato yadi saṃvṛtāvapyasattvaṃ tadā saṃvṛtisatyasyaiva vināśaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10n1014:3285: saṃvṛtāvapi adṛṣṭotpadāḥ śaśaśṛṅgādayo na tathāvidhakarmaṇāṃ sañcayābhāvāna tu paramārthasvabhāvarahitatvād,
SA10n1014:3287: na hetupratyayanirbharatāmātreṇa vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ māyādimithyāvastūnāṃ hetupratyayasamūhabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ pravṛttinivṛttidarśanāt |
SA10n1014:3288: na hi darśanamātreṇa vastūnāṃ tathābhāvaḥ sanniti nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:3290: ato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ spaṣṭataḥ siddhatve'pi pramāṇamārgasya jñānābhāvad ye'nyato dūṣitān nirākartumabhilaṣante,
SA10n1014:3295: evaṃvādinaṃ kaścit ' kathaṃ nāma ekasmādekasyānutpattibodhaḥ ' iti pṛcchatīti cet ?
SA10n1014:3298: yadi kecit 'tadanaṅgīokārāt kaścit tatkhaṇḍayatīti' kathayantīti cet ?
SA10n1014:3300: yadi kecana ' īśvarādinā ekena jagad utpadyata iti kathayantīti cet ?
SA10n1014:3302: yadyekamādekasyotpattiriti tadā sā nityād vā anityād vā bhavet |
SA10n1014:3303: na nityāt, tasya anutpannāvasthāto'bhinnatvāt pūrvāparakālavad madhye'pi utpādakatvavirodhāt |
SA10n1014:3308: nityatāyā hānisadbhāvāt kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ tasyotpādakatvaṃ vistareṇa nirākriyate |
SA10n1014:3312: na hi nityānityābhyāṃ vyatiriktastasya kaścanotpādaka iti |
SA10n1014:3313: ye cānyaiḥ [ vādibhiḥ ] ekasvabhāvā īśvarādayo jagato'sya hetavo manyante,
SA10n1014:3316: ata ekasmādekasyotpattirna bhavatīti kathanakāle bhrāntatayā īśvarādikaṃ yannirdiśanti,
SA10n1014:3318: na hi īśśvarādayo hetutvena astitvabhājo bhavanti,
SA10n1014:3320: nityastāvat sarvasāmarthyaśūnya iti ca pūrvameva prasādhitatatvāt |
SA10n1014:3323: yato hi tato yadi bhinnasantānavartināṃ falānāmutpattirbhavati,
SA10n1014:3324: tadā tasya anyasajātīyakṣaṇasya pratisandhānābhāvād dvitīya eva kṣaṇe samucchedaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:3325: yadyevaṃ tadā tataḥ sadā vijātīyafalānāmutpattikāle sarveṣāṃ pūrvasajātīyakṣaṇānāṃ paścād-vartini kṣaṇe pratisandhānābhāvād ye tāvadanityasvabhāvā īśvarādisaṃjñakā jagato hetutvenopajñāpyante, te ke ?
SA10n1014:3328: hetorabhāvena tasyotpatterasambhavāt athavā sampūrnameva jagat tadvadahetukameva syāt |
SA10n1014:3329: yato hi pūrvamapi paścādapi taddhetutvena [ sarvathā ] kimapi nāstīti |
SA10n1014:3333: tadā sa eva kathaṃ na tasya falaṃ vā tadutpanno veti kalpyate |
SA10n1014:3336: abhinnasantāne vidyamāno sa heturanādikālāt tasyāmeva santatau pravṛtta eveti,
SA10n1014:3337: naivānyasantāne vidyamānaḥ sannutpattikāraka iti kalpyate tadā tasmin paramārthato'samakālatvam,
SA10n1014:3338: anyatra ca sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirapi naiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ bahuśo nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:3339: ataccāpi hetubhedasya abhinnakārake prasaṅgaśca paścāt pratipādayiṣyate |
SA10n1014:3341: yadyante cakṣurādayastāvat falasyaikasya niyatotpādakā iti manyante,
SA10n1014:3343: yato hi cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi yadā svavijñānamutpadayanti tadā sajātīyānyakṣaṇāni notpādayanti |
SA10n1014:3348: yadyevaṃ tadā hetubhedo bhedaniyāmako naiva syāt |
SA10n1014:3349: yo hi ghaṭādīnāṃ paṭādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA10n1014:3352: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā ahetukānyeva tāvad vastūni syuḥ |
SA10n1014:3353: tatra hetubhede'pi yadi falabhedo na syāttadā hetorbhedābhedābhyāṃ falasya bhedābhedau na kṛtau syātām,
SA10n1014:3356: itthaṃ naiva te samūhād vyatiriktāḥ sidhyanti,
SA10n1014:3357: naiva ca te samūhāt pṛtham kartuṃ śakyante |
SA10n1014:3358: parantu parasparabhinnasvabhāvāt pratyekasmādutpattisāmarthayavato yadi falamudbhuyate tadā abhinnameva kathaṃ nāmodbhūyate |
SA10n1014:3360: na tvanekafalotpādana ityevaṃ cettadapi na yuktam |
SA10n1014:3361: yadyevaṃ tadā sajātīyafalapratīsandhānābhāvād dvītiye tāvat kṣaṇe cakṣurādisantānānoccheda eva syāt |
SA10n1014:3362: yadi teṣu sajātīyakṣaṇotpāde sāmarthyamityucyate tadā tadanyadeva tāvad vastu syāttataśca sāmarthyameva hetuḥ syānna na khalu vastu |
SA10n1014:3367: yadi te svabhāvabhūtaṃ samarthamuparkurvantīti manyate tadā falamapi tathaiva kiṃ na kurvantīti |
SA10n1014:3371: ataḥ kathaṃ nāma falaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:3373: anyacca [ falaṃ ] ekaikahetunirbharamityataḥ [ falaṃ ] bhinnaṃ syāditi cintyate,
SA10n1014:3376: ataḥ falasya sajātīya vijātīyatayorbhedo naiva syāt |
SA10n1014:3377: hetubhedastrāvat [ falasya ] bhedako na bhaviṣyatītyevaṃvidhasya prasaṅgasya ko hyarthaḥ ?
SA10n1014:3378: yadi khaṇḍaśo notpādayatītyarthastadā vastusvabhāvasya niraṃśatvād aśaṃtaścotpādasyāsvīkṛtatvāt kathaṃ nāma prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA10n1014:3380: yadi viśeṣako [ bhedako ] na bhavatītyevamartho gṛhyate tadā asiddhamevaitat |
SA10n1014:3381: hetubhistāvadanekebhyo vijātīyafalebhyo viparītameva jantaya ityabhidhānamapi naiva yuktam,
SA10n1014:3382: yato hyekasya aṃśata utpatterasambhavāditi prasaṅgo naivocyate,
SA10n1014:3383: parantu bhavanto ye vastuṣu parasparaṃ vyatirekaṃ viśeṣaṃ vā manvate,
SA10n1014:3385: yadi vividhahetūnaṅgīkṛtyāpi falamekavidhameva svīkṛyate tadā bhrāntisadbhāvād vastūnāṃ tāvad bhedo vividhahetubhirakṛta eva syādityevaṃ prasaṅgo nūnamabhidhānīyaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:3390: tadā tebhya utpadyaṃ sajātīyaṃ falaṃ vijātīyaṃ ca naiva parasparanivṛttaṃ syād,
SA10n1014:3392: yadi hetavaste nivṛttisvabhāvatvāt svayaṃ sajātīyafalanāṃ bhedakā api bhaviṣyantītyucyate,
SA10n1014:3393: tadā tathaiva te sāmānyafale'pi kathaṃ na bhedakāḥ ?
SA10n1014:3394: yato hi tatra sarve ekaikā hetavo bhavanti |
SA10n1014:3395: ye tāvadekotpādakasvabhāvā eva te tato viparītaṃ kamapyanyaṃ notpādayituṃ śaktāḥ,
SA10n1014:3396: yato hi te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttyā anyārtha iva bhavanti,
SA10n1014:3398: punaste parasparanivṛttasvabhāvāḥ kintu naiva te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttāḥ |
SA10n1014:3406: ekasvabhāvasyābhāvo naiva tasya svabhāvo bhavituṃ śaknoti,
SA10n1014:3408: tenaiva tatfalaṃ niṣpādanīyamiti yaduktaṃ tatra kā yuktiriti cet sāṃkhyaireva tatsamādhānaṃ vidheyamiti śobhanaṃ pratibhāti |
SA10n1014:3409: yato hi te khalu bhinnabhinnasvabhāvaṃ jagaditi pratipādayanti |
SA10n1014:3410: atasteṣāṃ yattatra grahaṇaṃ tannivṛtyarthameva ācāryeṇa bhinnavastunirdeśakānāṃ kṛte vyavahāravaśāduktam tāni [ vastūni ] pratītyasamutpannatayā naiva paramārthata ekārthāni nāpi ca bhinnarthānīti manvānāṃ kṛte naiva kimapyuktamiti |
SA10n1014:3411: teṣāṃ tāvadanusāraṃ tu māyāsadṛśatvāt sarveṣu teṣu na kimapyekaṃ vastu bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sidhyati |
SA10n1014:3412: api ca, yadi vastuṣu paramārthataḥ svabhavadvayam,
SA10n1014:3414: aparaśca svabhāvalakṣaṇastadā nivṛtte'pyasmin svabhāvenaivotpādakalakṣaṇastāvannivartata ityuttaraṃ khalu samīcīnaṃ syāditi |
SA10n1014:3415: yasmin samaye sarva evotpādakasvabhāvastasmin samaye yadi te parasparanivṛttasvabhāvā api tadā utpādakasvabhāvato nivṛttatvāt kathaṃ nāmotpādakāḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1014:3416: teṣāmayameva svabhāvo yat svabhāvabhede'pi ekamutpādayanti viruddhasvabhāve'pi ca sati naiva parīkṣāyogyā iti yadi bhavadbhirucyate tadā pādau prasārya tathātāparīkṣātaḥ parāṅmukhabuddhayo ye vyavahāramātramanusaranti te sukhenāsituṃ śaknuvanti |
SA10n1014:3417: ye tu tathātāparīkṣāyāṃ pravṛtabuddhayasteṣāṃ kṛte tathaiva sukhāsanaṃ naiva yuktarupam |
SA10n1014:3418: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā īśvarādistāvadekaḥ sannapi svabhāvabhede'pi ca sati krameṇa yugapad vā vicitrasyāsya jagato heturupeṇa naiva kathamapi viruddho bhaviṣyati,
SA10n1014:3420: svabhāvabhede'pi nāsti parīkṣāyogya ityabhidadhatāṃ kṛte kiṃ nāmottaraṃ dattaṃ syāt ?
SA10n1014:3421: tenaiva falamutpādanīyamiti pratipādayatāṃ tatra kā yuktiriti ye kathayanti teṣāṃ kṛte agnyādikamapekṣyotpadyamāno dhūmastāvad śakramūrdhato'uputpadyata iti kathanaṃ yathā ahetukatve yuktyā prasaṅgatayocyate,
SA10n1014:3423: vyavahāre'pi ekasamūhāntargato yadyekafalasyotpādako bhavettadā naiva viruddhaḥ,
SA10n1014:3424: kintu samūhāntargatastu viruddha evetyevaṃ kathayadbhiḥ saha nāsti kaścana bhedaḥ |
SA10n1014:3428: samuho'pi bhinnaḥ svabhāvataścotpanna ityevamabhidadhānaiḥ saha ko virodha iti vaktavyaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:3429: tatra yathā ekasamūhamāśrityotpadyamānaṃ falaṃ samūhāntareṇāpyutpadyate tadā tenotpādyasya svabhāvasyāniyatatvād ahetuka ityucyate,
SA10n1014:3430: tathaiva ekasminneva samūhe vijñānādayo yadā ekahetumapekṣyāpi tadvilakṣaṇahetuta utpadyante tadā kimityahetukatāyāḥ prasaṅgo noktaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:3431: hetoryathātmakena prayogeṇa nirduṣṭāt svabhāvaviśeṣād hetubhedo bhedakaśca viruddhāveva syātām |
SA10n1014:3432: yato hi cakṣurādinā bhinnasvabhāvena cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ falānāmutpattikāle sākṣād bhedābhāve'pi pratītisvabhāvād rūpādayaḥ pṛthagviṣayatvena niyatā bhavanti,
SA10n1014:3434: te cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ samantarapratyayena ca pratītisvabhāvāḥ syuḥ,
SA10n1014:3440: viṣayeṇa ca samantarapratyayena cāpi pṛthaktayā viṣayagrahaṇaṃ naiva niyatam |
SA10n1014:3441: evaṃvidhayā niyatavyavasthayā niścayena hetubhedo bhedaka eva syāt |
SA10n1014:3442: bheda eva bhinnaviśeṣa ityasau vicāro yadi vyavahāratayā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthamevocyate tadā tu sutarāṃ yajyate,
SA10n1014:3444: atha ye tāvad bhedāstee aprajñaptimātrātmakā vā nivṛttiviśeṣeṇa prajñaptisvabhāvātmakā vā ?
SA10n1014:3445: yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastadā vijñānasya ālambanādasvabhāvādabhinnatvena tathaivānekatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:3448: tathaivābhinne'pi rūpādibhya utpadyata ityucyata iti cedekasmin ekadā parasparaviruddhāvutpādānutpādau kathaṃ nāma na viruddhau syātāmityayaṃ doṣo naiva yujyatāmiti vicārya ye viśeṣān vijñānato bhinnārthatvena kalpayanti teṣāṃ tadā vijñānamahetukaṃ syād anyasminneva tadā cakṣurādīnāṃ yogāt |
SA10n1014:3450: yadi prajñaptisvabhāva iti dvitīyapakṣaḥ svīkriyate tadāpi vijñānasyāhetukatvaṃ prasajyata eva,
SA10n1014:3452: prajñaptyātmakatve kasyāpi yogo naiva bhavatītyataḥ sarveṣāmahetukatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA10n1014:3453: falataḥ paramārthato'nekebhya ekasya falasyotpattirnaiva sarvathā yujayata iti |
SA10n1014:3457: tadā hetubhedābhāve'pi falasya bhinnatvāt falasya tāvad bhedābhedau kathaṃ nāhetukāviti |
SA10n1014:3458: yena khalu kāraṇena tatra falāntarotpattimattve nāstyanyaḥ [ kaścana] viśeṣaḥ,
SA10n1014:3460: ato hettuatāvat svabhāvapracyuto bhūtvā falaṃ notpādayatīti,
SA10n1014:3461: tathāpi tasmin hetvātmakatve bhedābhāvāt tannirvṛte fale'pi tāvad bhedo na syāt |
SA10n1014:3465: atastasyāḥ parihāraṃ kartuṃ śakyata ityabhidhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:3469: yad yathā dṛśyate tattathaiva sadityabhiniviśamānānāṃ kevalaṃ mithyākalpanānāṃ nirākaraṇāya svapna iva sādhyamānatvānnāsti tāvad virodho'pīti |
SA10n1014:3470: api ca, cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ yānyanekasmādutyadyamānāni dṛśyante,
SA10n1014:3471: teṣāṃ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvastāvadekatvena naiva kathamapi siddhaḥ,
SA10n1014:3473: vividho'pi svabhāvo yadyekaḥ syāttadā sarveṣāmevaikadravyatāprasaṅgaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:3476: ekasya cānekaṣāṃ ca vastūnāṃ paramārthata utpattistāvat kutra samavalokyate ?
SA10n1014:3478: ekaikasya falasya stāvadanaikairhetubhiḥ kriyamāṇatvādayamapi pakṣastāvadanekasmādekasyaivotpattipakṣaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:3483: ato nāstyayamasiddho heturapi koṭīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo'pi kaścanotpattipakṣaḥ |
SA10n1014:3487: ācāryo'pi saṃvṛtau kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitiṃ svīkṛtya yathā vyavahāre ekasmādanekasya cānekasmādekasya cotpattiḥ prasidhyati tathā dṛśyata eveti kathayāgāsa |
SA10n1014:3488: cakṣurādibhiranvaya-vyatirekābhyāṃ cakṣurvijñānādīnāmutpattiviśeṣaṃ jñātvā bālāpṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ kāryahetvorbhedakāle yadi heturbhinnastadā kāryabhedo'pi sutarāṃ syādityuktavān,
SA10n1014:3493: teṣāṃ sameṣāṃ samādhānamapi pṛthak-pṛthasmāmiḥ pūrvameva kṛtam |
SA10n1014:3495: sa anaikāntika iti ye kathitavantasteṣāmapyuttaraṃ dattapūrvameva |
SA10n1014:3497: tadā naiva tāni saṃvṛtāvapi bhavituṃ śakyānīti yaduktam,
SA10n1014:3500: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmapi samādhānaṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pūrvaṃ samyaktayā kṛtameva |
SA10n1014:3501: tathāpi ye tāvat kecana dveṣavaśād dūṣaṇāni prayuñjate,
SA10n1014:3506: tadabhivyaktadharmasvīkārāttasyāpi [ hetoḥ ] tāvat sāmarthyataḥ svīkaraṇameva syāditi |
SA10n1014:3507: tatra yaistāvat kadācid īśvarādayo nityaikatvasvabhāvena parikalpitāstaisteṣu kramotpādadharmayogo'pi yataḥ svīkriyate,
SA10n1014:3510: yadyutpādaka eva svabhāvaḥ syāttadā pūrvāvasthātaḥ svabhāvasya bhinnalakṣaṇatvādekatvahānireva syāditi |
SA10n1014:3512: yato hi tattvatāyāṃ samakālikatvamaparasmiṃśca svaparapratisandhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ prasādhitameva |
SA10n1014:3513: ye tāvadākāśādīnāṃ trayāṇāmasaṃkṛtānāmekasvabhāvatvaṃ falapratisandhānābhāvaṃ ca teṣāṃ svīkurvanti,
SA10n1014:3516: yato hi pratyekajñānāttajjñeyasvabhāvastāvad bhinna eva syāt |
SA10n1014:3517: yadi na syāttadā'bhinnatvāt pūrvavat tajjñāne jñeyasvabhāvo naivopapannaḥ syādata ekasvabhāvastāvannaiva yujyata iti |
SA10n1014:3519: ye tāvannityaikasvabhāvāḥ kāla-puruṣa-pradhāna-brahmādayaśca vicitrāyā asyā jagadvyavasthāyā hetutvena parikalpyante,
SA10n1014:3520: te yadi satyāsatyādivividhasvabhāvāṃ vastusāmagrīṃ krameṇa yugapad vā gṛhṇantīti svīkriyate tadā tatsāmarthyata ekatvarahita eva svabhāve te niyamena te niyamena svīkṛtāḥ syuḥ,
SA10n1014:3521: yato hi vividhasvabhāvasya jagato grahaṇe ekasvabhāvā naiva yujyante |
SA10n1014:3525: ye tāvat pudgalāmidhaṃ padārthaṃ nityānityatvenānirvacanīyamiti parikalpayanti te'uyenam ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvena sākṣāt svīkurvantyeva,
SA10n1014:3527: api ca, bhinnabhinnasvabhāvenānubhūyamānasya tāvat kṣaṇikatve'nirvacanīyatā naiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:3528: kāyaḥ bhūmiparvatādayo ye'nityāḥ sāvayavāḥ pṛthaksvabhāvāstān ekadravyatnena parikalpayanti,
SA10n1014:3529: te'pi tadavayavadravyaṃ bhinnānekaviṣayavyāpakamiti svīkurvantyata ekatvarahitataiva teṣāṃ svīkṛtā syāt yato hi yadi tasya pratyekasminnavayave nāsti bhinnasvabhāvastadā naiva tasmin vyapakatā'pyupapadyata iti |
SA10n1014:3531: ye tāvad dehādīnāṃ paramāṇusañcayātmakatvāt tān paramāṇūn pṛthakśaḥ parikalpayanti,
SA10n1014:3533: yato hi niraṃśasvabhāve [ vastuni ] yatraiva hi saṃyogādayo'nubhūyante,
SA10n1014:3534: tatra tādṛśo nāstyeva kaścana pakṣaḥ [ bhāgaḥ ],
SA10n1014:3535: yasmin pakṣeṇa kenacit saha saṃyogaḥ sañcayo vā na bhavanti,
SA10n1014:3536: tādṛśeṣu [ niraṃśeṣu ] vistareṇa viṣayavyāptirapi naiva yujyate |
SA10n1014:3539: paramāṇuṣu cāvayavidravyeṣu cobhayeṣu tāvadanekasvabhāvatvamapi na yujyate,
SA10n1014:3540: yato hi sañcitasvabhāvātmakatvātte yadā naivaikasvabhāvatve yujyante tadā tatparatantratayā vyavasthitatvena teṣāmanekasvabhāvatvamapi naiva sidhyati |
SA10n1014:3541: itthaṃ yadā kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ cāpi dravyamekānesvabhāvarahitaṃ siddham,
SA10n1014:3542: tadā tadādhārena kalpitanāṃ guṇa-karma-sāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃghātasya cāpi siddhiḥ sutarāṃ naiva syāt,
SA10n1014:3545: jñānamapi tāvat kāmamekasvabhāvamityupakalpyatāṃ kintu tatsvarupaṃ vividhasyabhāvagrāhakamiti svīkṛtatvāt tatsāmarthyata ekasvabhāvarahitameva taditi svīkṛtaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:3546: yato hi tajjñānaṃ tāvat sākāramityavaśyaṃ svīkarttavyam,
SA10n1014:3547: anyathā viṣayākāreṇa yo nākāritastasya jñānakāyasya viṣayaġrāhakarūpeṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ nopapannaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:3548: yadi sākāratvena svīkriyate tadā tasyaikasvabhāvarahitatvamapi spaṣṭatayā svīkṛtameva syāt,
SA10n1014:3551: ataḥ sarvāṇyeva tāvajjñānāni vibhinnānāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣayitvena svīkriyante |
SA10n1014:3552: ata eva svayūthyāḥ ' sañcitālambanāḥ paścavijñānakāyāḥ ' iti svīkurvanti |
SA10n1014:3556: tatra vividhatāyāṃ [ vicitratāyāṃ ] svamatasthāpanārtha tāvadanekajñānotpattikalpanamapi nāsti samīcīnam,
SA10n1014:3559: guṇakarmasamavetānāṃ dravyādīnāṃ tāvajjñānena yugapadgrahaṇasvīkārād apare'pi [ siddhāntavādinaḥ ] jñānaṃ citrākāratvenaiva svīkurvanti |
SA10n1014:3560: ye hi dravyaparyāyādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvaṃ vastu tāvanmecakamaṇivadityāmananti,
SA10n1014:3570: svapnādijñānānyapi nīlādivibhinnākārān anubhavantīti tanyekasvabhāvānīti naiva yuktāni |
SA10n1014:3572: te bāhyapadārthānāmaviṣayibhūtatvāttat svasaṃvedanasvarūpaṃ paryantaṃ ca jñānamiti svīkurvanti,
SA10n1014:3573: te'pyanādikālīnabhrāntavāsānāparipākavaśād rūpādivibhinnaviparītāvabhāsānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāmutpattiṃ svīkurvantyato vijñānamekasvabhāvamiti naivābhyupagacchanti |
SA10n1014:3574: falato darśaneṣu kasminnapi vijñānaṃ naikasvabhāvamiti sidhyati |
SA10n1014:3576: tadā anekasvabhāvo'pi na sidhyatīti bahuśaḥ pūrvamāveditam |
SA10n1014:3577: ata eva svātantryeṇa sādhako hetirapyayaṃ nāsiddha iti yathoktanayena vādiprativādyubhyeṣu sarve dharma ekānekasvabhāvarahitā eva siddhāḥ |
SA10n1014:3578: ye va vyavacchedamātrātmakāsteṣu sādhyasādhanānugato dharmeyeva avastubhūtaḥ sidhyatīti pūrvamanekadhā nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:3585: yato hi yathoktanayenaiva te hetuṃ sādhayantīti |
SA10n1014:3586: ityevaṃ ye kecidindriyairagamyā ātmādayaste tadvyāptakramikakāryayogādidharmāṇāṃ svīkṛtyā ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvenaiva prasiddhāḥ |
SA10n1014:3588: tādṛśānāṃ vastūnāṃ pratiṣedhāya dharmiṇaḥ parīkṣāyāḥ sarvatrānivāryatvāt |
SA10n1014:3590: anyathā [ yadyevaṃ na syāt] tadā tanniṣedhāya bhavatāmapi arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogalakṣaṇo hetustāvat kathaṃ siddho bhaviṣyatīti codanā kathaṃ na syāt |
SA10n1014:3591: paraparikalpite dharmiṇi tathāvidhakramikakāryāṇāṃ svīkṛtyaiva tadvyāptadharmāṇāṃ niṣpattestanmatamātrāśritatvād dharmiṇastasya tāvat parikalpitatvameva |
SA10n1014:3594: vyavahāreṇāpi tāvat sādhyavyāptasādhanasya siddhatvāditi pūrvameva samyaguktatvāt |
SA10n1014:3598: ekasvabhāvahitatvena siddhe satyanekasvabhāvarāhityamapi sutarāṃ pratyakṣataḥ siddhameva,
SA10n1014:3611: āropasvabhāvātmakatvāt sarvapratyakṣāṇāṃ kathaṃ hi tairekānekasvabhāvayuktatvaṃ jñātuṃ śakyata iti cintāyāṃ heturyamatra māyākārāpratyakṣānumānābhyāmanaikāntika eva |
SA10n1014:3612: yato hi māyākārajñāne tāvad yo'yaṃ gajādyākārāropastasmin svabhāve paramārthato nabhiniveśo jāyate |
SA10n1014:3614: evaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣasya nirākṛte'pi bhāntikāraṇe kadācidanyāropākārasvabhāvavataḥ [ jñānasya ] utpattirbhavatīti paramārthatastatsvabhāve'nabhiniveśena hetunā niyatena tāvattadviviktaviṣayitvena vyavasthāpyate |
SA10n1014:3615: tathaivānumānajñānamapi yaddhi sāmānye tāvad vastulakṣaṇe samāropākāram,
SA10n1014:3616: tadapi vastutathatāyā yathāvajjñānasvabhāvatvāt tadviṣayakaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇasadbhāvādanaikāntika eva hetuḥ |
SA10n1014:3623: vividhaprakārādiliṅgaiḥ sarve yadyekasvabhāvarahitatvena sādhyante tadā te'nekatvasvabhāvarahitā api sidhyanyeva,
SA10n1014:3627: vyavahāre ghaṭādiviṣayaparicchedena puruṣā atulyasambaddhān vyavahārayogyānatyantaṃ paricchedayanti |
SA10n1014:3631: paricchedo yadi naiva viccinnastadā sa nāstyeva,
SA10n1014:3639: vyāpyasya vyāpakasya vā vastunaḥ svato'siddhatvādasiddha eva sa heturiti kecana |
SA10n1014:3640: tathaiva dharmiṇyeva kevale vyāpyasadbhāvasidhyarthaṃ vyāpakanivṛtyā vyāpyanivṛttirasiddhaivetyapare |
SA10n1014:3641: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ [ ākṣepāṇāṃ ] samādhānaṃ tāvatpūrvamevāsmābhiḥ kṛtam |
SA10n1014:3642: evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakādisarvavastūnāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃvṛttyāśritatvaṃ prasādhya paścād vyavasthā kṛtetyapi pūrvamāveditameva |
SA10n1014:3643: atyantaṃ samīpavartini vyāpake niyataṃ vyāpyaviśeṣajñānaṃ naiva bhavatītyapi pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:3649: ato vivādāspadībhūteṣu sarvadharmiṣu sāmānyena sādhayitumiṣyamāṇatvāt kathamimau dvau [ vyāpyavyāpakau ] ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritāviti cet ?
SA10n1014:3650: ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritatve'pi [ mithaḥ ] sāpekṣatvād bhinnāveveti nāsti doṣaḥ |
SA10n1014:3660: ye sarvābhilāpavigatalakṣaṇāste na kathañcanāpi bodhyā bodhakāśca,
SA10n1014:3673: atastasmin kathaṃ na sarva vivādā āpateyuriti |
SA10n1014:3674: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ |
SA10n1014:3676: bhāvā yatra vicāryante na te santi savabhāvataḥ |
SA10n1014:3680: yadi niḥsvabhāvatā tatra naiva bodhyata iti cettadā aśvaśṛṅgasyāpi bodhābhāvaḥ kathaṃ nollikhyate |
SA10n1014:3681: bhavatāmabhilāpalakṣaṇarahitāḥ sarva bhāvā na manāgapi bodhyanta ityādiprayogeṣu vidyata eva sādhya-sādhakayorniṣedhasvabhāvaḥ,
SA10n1014:3684: ato nāsti prayogakauśalamapi sarvesāṃ vastunāṃ niścetavyaprasaṅgālliṅgasyaiva vastuno bodho na kenāpi svīkriyate,
SA10n1014:3688: liṅgaṃ tāvat kalpanayā bodhakatvena vyavasthitamiti yuktam |
SA10n1014:3689: ato niḥ svabhāvatve'pi niayatatadākārasya sādhyakāraniścayotpattau hetutvād bodhakatvena kalpanāyāṃ nāsti kaścana doṣaḥ |
SA10n1014:3691: ākāśaniṣedhakasya liṅgasya nitarāṃ kalpitatvādeveti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:3693: tatrāpi yadi vastubhūtaḥ sambandha evaiko hetutvena kathayitumiṣyate,
SA10n1014:3696: sa [ sambandhaḥ ] tāvad dvayāśritatvena parasparaśliṣṭasvabhāvatvena copakalpyate |
SA10n1014:3697: dvayorniṣpannayoḥ [ vastunoḥ ] svabhāvaḥ śliṣṭa iti nopapadyate,
SA10n1014:3701: ekatve sati naiva dvayāśritvaṃ tāvad yuktam |
SA10n1014:3702: yadi sa sambandhibhyo'rthāntara iti tadā svasvabhāvavyavasthitatvāt kathaṃ nāma sambaddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:3703: yadi nāstyarthāntara iti tadā kevalaṃ sambandhināveva syātām |
SA10n1014:3706: yāni hi sambandhodbhūtāni lakṣaṇāni tānyapi kalpanātmakānyeva,
SA10n1014:3709: api ca, yadā kāryasvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ tadā apekṣāvirahānnaiva tasya kūtracinnirbharatvam |
SA10n1014:3710: ato nāsti tasya kenāpi saha sambandhaḥ |
SA10n1014:3711: apariniṣpanne'pi tasmin kāraṇena saha sambandhakāle vidūre sthitatvādasambaddhameva tat syāditi |
SA10n1014:3723: asambaddhatve sati abhedābhāvāt kathaṃ tādṛśī yaktiḥ,
SA10n1014:3725: abhede sati tadātmaka eva sambandha iti nirdeśaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:3731: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā ' abhinnatvād ' ityapi vaktuṃ na paryeta |
SA10n1014:3732: tatra ' abhinnatvad ' ityayaṃ heturyadi paramārthādhikāreṇocyeta tadā anekāntika eva,
SA10n1014:3733: yato hi kṛtakatvānityatve yadyapi paramārthato naiva bhinne tathāpi bodhya-bodhakavastuṣu tāvat te dṛśyete |
SA10n1014:3734: yadi vyavahāre'pi tayornāsti bhinnatvamityucyeta tadā asiddhameva,
SA10n1014:3736: evameva śabdādidharmiṇi yadā akṛtakatvādito nivṛttirniścīyate tadā nityādito'pi nirvṛtterniścayanāt paramārthato bhinnatāyā abhāve'pi nivṛttiviśeṣāpekṣayā kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ bhinnavyavasthāyā upakalpanād bodhyabodhakavastuvyavasthā tāvat kriyata eva |
SA10n1014:3737: itthaṃ yadā vastūni sāmarthyataḥ pratimbivad ekānekasvabhāvavinivṛttāni bhavanti tadā paramārthasvabhāvato'pi teṣāṃ nivṛttirniyataiva |
SA10n1014:3739: ata eva ca tatra bodhya-bodhakabhāvo'pi sambhavatyeva |
SA10n1014:3740: punaśca, yathā nityaṃ tāvd vastu arthakriyāsāmarthyavirahād vastusvabhāvena rahitaṃ sādhyate,
SA10n1014:3742: [41] yadapi atadvyāvṛttiviśeṣeṇānayoḥ kṛtakatvaṃ tad vastu syāt nīlapītādivattasvabhāvatvāditi kathanaṃ tāvadasambaddhameva,
SA10n1014:3746: yathā nityavastuniṣedhāya arthakriyāsāmārthyarahitatvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ ca vyāvṛttikṛtaviśeṣe satyapi naiva vastu,
SA10n1014:3749: yatkhalu nīlātmakaṃ pītātmakamiti nidarśanaṃ tadapi paramārthe tāvad vastunyasiddhatvādayuktam |
SA10n1014:3752: yato hi nayo'yamasanniti kathanamātreṇa tāvat paramārthe vastuni na kimapi siddhaṃ bhāvati,
SA10n1014:3754: tatra buddhau pratibhāsamāno yo hi pūrvodito dharmī,
SA10n1014:3756: kintu paramārthe vastuni sa naiva yuktarupaḥ |
SA10n1014:3758: ekānekasvabhāvarahitaṃ khalu paramārthaṃ vastu naiva kiñcit,
SA10n1014:3760: sarve khalu padārthāḥ ekānekasvabhāvābhyāṃ vyāptā iti tu pūrvameva prasādhitam |
SA10n1014:3761: māyādibhiravyatiriktāḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvā hi bhāvāste yadi ' vastu ' nāmnā vyavahriyeran,
SA10n1014:3769: [ 42 ] evaṃ yathā ekānekasvabhāvalakṣaṇo hetustāvannairātmyaṃ sādhayati tadvadabhāvadharmini dharmivyāvṛttisādhakatvād viruddho'yaṃ heturiti yaduktaṃ tattu atyantaṃ pramāṇānabhijñatāmātrameva |
SA10n1014:3772: kintu yadā sa [ dharmī ] niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhyate tadā siddhe'pi vādino mate kathaṃ tāvad viruddho heturbhaviṣyati |
SA10n1014:3773: niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ hi sādhayitumiṣṭāyāṃ vastusvabhāvo dharmī naiva sambhavati,
SA10n1014:3775: ataḥ sādhyasādhanābhyāṃ yathokto dharmī avastubhūta eva sammat ityasmāt kāraṇāt tena hetunā tāvad vyāvṛttireva sādhayate |
SA10n1014:3777: yathā'yaṃ heturnairātmyaṃ sādhayati tathaiva abhāvadharmyapīti keṣāñcit kathanamasambaddhameva |
SA10n1014:3778: yato hi yena kāraṇena tāvannairātmyasya abhāvasya ca dvayordharmayorviruddhahetubhyāṃ siddhirucyate,
SA10n1014:3787: dṛśayate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam ||
SA10n1014:3788: falato niḥsvabhāvatāsādhanārthaṃ na ko'pi heturiti yatkathanam,
SA10n1014:3790: [ 43-44] yadi vijñānamapi itaradharmāṇāmiva niḥsvabhāvameva syāttadā mithyātvād yogibhiranyadharmāṇāmiva tasyāpi parityāgaḥ kariṣyata eva |
SA10n1014:3791: yadyevaṃ kariṣyate tadā na ko'pi yogino bhaviṣyanti,
SA10n1014:3793: nāpi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ naiva ca teṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1014:3794: anena khalu hetunā sarvāsāṃ vyavasthānāṃ vilopa eva syāditi yatkathanaṃ tadapi naiva yuktam,
SA10n1014:3795: yato hi prasaṅgastāvadayaṃ yadi satyābhiniveśaparityāgārthamucyate tadā saharṣamucyatām,
SA10n1014:3800: yanmithyā tat sarvathā parityājyamityetasya naiva kimapi kāraṇamupalabhāmahe,
SA10n1014:3803: te yogibhiḥ parityājyā iti kathanaṃ tu yujyate,
SA10n1014:3804: parantu ye tavat sākṣāt paramparayā vā sva-paraprayojanaprasādhakāḥ,
SA10n1014:3805: kṛpālūnāṃ parahitakaraṇopāyabhūtāsteṣāṃ kathaṃ sarvadā parityāgaḥ kartum śakyate |
SA10n1014:3807: te sarve viparītaparihāradvārā parityājyā api yāvatsaṃsāramaparityājyā eva |
SA10n1014:3808: te yadyapi māyākāra iva sarvān mithyābhūtān jānanti,
SA10n1014:3814: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato'sya saḥ ||
SA10n1014:3817: bhāvo'pi tāvanna grāhyo na cābhāvo'pi parityājyaḥ,
SA10n1014:3821: kṛpāparādhīnacetaso yogino'pi parahitārthaṃ vividharūpeṇa gajādimithyānirmāṇādikaṃ sādhayanti |
SA10n1014:3822: tatra mahākaruṇāparādhīnatayā ye pareṣām aśeṣahitasukhopāyaśālinaḥ prajñālokena vidhvastasakalakleśāndhakārāḥ parahitābhilāṣiṇo matimantaste prahīṇeṣvapi sakalaviparyāseṣu pūrvapraṇidhānavaśatayā yāvat sattvakarmakleśāstāvadākāśaparyantaṃ sthātumevābhilaṣante |
SA10n1014:3823: itthaṃ sameṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve'pi hetupratyayasāmagrīpāratantryena māyāvat sambhavantyeva |
SA10n1014:3831: saṃkṣepato bhagavatām apratisṭhitanirvāṇahetustu karunā prajñā ca |
SA10n1014:3832: kṛpayā hi tannirvāṇāvabodhe'pi te naiva tasya sākṣātkāraṃ kurvanti |
SA10n1014:3833: prajñayā tāvat sarvasaṃkleśahetoḥ sammohasyānavakāśāt saṃsāradoṣagandhenāpyaliptāḥ santo naiva saṃsāre patanti |
SA10n1014:3836: ata eva ca sā bodhasattvānāṃ mārga ucyate |
SA10n1014:3837: tayā virahitāḥ sattvāstu śrāvakādibhūmisu patanti | yathoktam..........
SA10n1014:3842: tadā nūnaṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā eva bhavanti |“
SA10n1014:3844: tadyathā-acintyasāmarthyavattvād yogino yathā vastūnyavabhāsante tathā karatalāmalakavat saṃvṛtiparamārthākārābhyāṃ sarvākāraṃ pratyakṣatayā avabudhyanti |
SA10n1014:3846: sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ niruttaraṃ lokottaramaśesadharmanirābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ tattvāva-bodhakaṃ bhavati,
SA10n1014:3847: [ tathāpi ] vyavahāre sarvaṃ nirmāṇavat sadeva bhavati |
SA10n1014:3852: sarve dharmā nirmāṇaniva bhavanti tadā bhagavati nirvāṇe ca kimantaram ?
SA10n1014:3854: katham ? bhagavataḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirmāṇavad bhavanti |
SA10n1014:3856: nirmaṇasya tāvannodbhavo nāpi parinirvāṇaṃ kimapi bhavati |
SA10n1014:3857: itthaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ sarvadharmeṣu nirmāṇamivādhimuktiṃ vidhāya prajñāpāramitāyāmācaritavyam |
SA10n1014:3859: [45] ye hi rūpādayo bhinnadeśakālāvasthāsu spaṣṭaṃ pratyakṣeṇāvabhāsante te niścayena svabhāvena yuktā ityataḥ pratijñā tāvat pratyakṣeṇa bādhiteti yat pūrvamuktam,
SA10n1014:3864: kintu naiva svabhāvaḥ paramārthatayā siddha iti pūrvamāveditam |
SA10n1014:3865: api ca, yadi bhrāntapratyakṣe'vabhāsitatvat pratyakṣe'vabhāsitatvamabhyuopagamyate tadā naiva tena bādhā yujyate,
SA10n1014:3866: timirādyupahatalocaneṣu vidyamāne'pi dvicandre na tena ekacandrādibādhā yuktimatī |
SA10n1014:3867: yadyabhrānta-pratyakṣe'vabhāsitatvena tthā [ bādhā ] abhyupeyate tadā tannaiva sidhyati,
SA10n1014:3869: na cakṣuḥ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇaṃ na jihṇa pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam |
SA10n1014:3870: pramāṇa yadyeta bhaveyurindriyā kasyāryamārgeṇa bhaveta kāryam ||
SA10n1014:3871: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jaḍāḥ svabhāvena avyākṛtāśca |
SA10n1014:3872: tasmād ya nirvāṇapathaiva arthikaḥ sa āryamārgeṇa karotu karyam ||
SA10n1014:3874: te naiva kimapi vastu sattvenālambante | yathoktam-
SA10n1014:3876: te rūpa-vedanā-saṃjñā-saṃskāra-vijñānata ārabhya sarvākārajñānaparyantaṃ tathāgatacakṣuṣā anupalabdheṣu sarvadharmeṣu sattvenābhiniviśante “.......iti vastaraḥ |
SA10n1014:3877: pratijñāyā anumānenābhāsa iti yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
SA10n1014:3878: yato hi nānumānena kimapi vastu svabhāvataḥ sidhyati,
SA10n1014:3899: mahāmate, sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā ityapi bodhisattvairnaiva pratijñā kāryā |
SA10n1014:3904: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na vidyate |
SA10n1014:3942: rūpata ārabhya sarvākārajñānaparyantaṃ ye tāvad dharmāsteṣāṃ na staḥ saṃyogaviyogāvapi |
SA10n1014:3943: yato hi rūpaṃ adarśnam apratigham alakṣaṇameva asattvāt |
SA10n1014:3944: sattvānāṃ grahaṇārthaṃ te kevalaṃ tathāgatena lokavyavahārārthaṃ kathitāḥ,
SA10n1014:3946: lokasaṃvṛtau ye pinaḥ prāptirabhisamayaḥ pañcagatibhedāste'pi pūrvata eva paramārthato na santi |
SA10n1014:3953: teṣāṃ tāvadaniṣedhena svīkaraṇe'pi nāsti[ kaścana ] doṣaḥ |
SA10n1014:3954: anyatra bhagavān spapne sarpaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchā tadabhāve saṃkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ ca mithyaiveti kathitavān |
SA10n1014:3956: yato hi mahāyānāndanyatra bhagavān teṣāṃ [ āryasatyānāṃ ] upadeśaṃ kṛtavān |
SA10n1014:3958: “yaduta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgadho mārgaśceti naiva santyāryāṇāṃ satyāni,
SA10n1014:3968: tattu śrāvakānadhikṛtya saṃsārodvignamānasānāṃ kṛte pudgalanairātmyapraveśāryaṃ tāvadanityādisvabhāvatvena kevalaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
SA10n1014:3970: [53] yaśca tāvajjanyajanakasvabhāvo janeṣvāgopālaṃ prasiddhastena prasiddhivirodhadoṣo'pīti yaduktaṃ tadapyasambaddhameva,
SA10n1014:3972: yadi prasiddhastadā te naiva santi sādhāraṇajanāḥ |
SA10n1014:3976: tadā tadvirodhaparihāreṇa tadbādhāyā api parihāraḥ kṛta eva |
SA10n1014:3977: [54] yaccāvaśyaṃ parotpattyarthaṃ hetuprayogābhilāṣeṇa tato'vaśyamutpattyabhyupagamāt svavacanavirodha ityuktam,
SA10n1014:3979: niyatotpattyarthaṃ hetuprayogānnaiva tataḥ paramārthato niyatotpattirabhyupagatā bhavati |
SA10n1014:3983: paramārthata utpattiniṣedhenātra vastūnāṃ niḥsvabhāvataiva paramārthataḥ sādhayitumiṣyate,
SA10n1014:3985: ato yadyapi hetubhyo niyatatayā pāramārthikī utpattirnaiva bhavati,
SA10n1014:3988: [55] yacca bhagavatā-“ cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlam“ -ityuktam,
SA10n1014:3990: anyatra tu-“ na cakṣuḥ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇam“ ityādinā ṣaḍindriyāṇāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ pratiṣiddhameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:3992: lokasaṃvṛtau tu sarva [ dharmāḥ ] saṃvidyanta evetyevaṃvidhaṃ bhagavān svābhiprayaṃ suspaṣṭaṃ prakaṭitavān |
SA10n1014:4002: nāma rūpaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇam ityat ārabhya yāvad buddhatvam anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiḥ buddha iti tāvad dvatetyupadideśa |
SA10n1014:4007: ato vyāvahārikacakṣurādīnābhisandhāya draṣṭṛtvato jñātṛtvaparyantamātmaprasiddhestaddṛṣṭiniṣedhāryaṃ pudgalanairātmyapraveśābhiprāyeṇa cakṣurādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ |
SA10n1014:4008: ata eva cānābhāsina ākāśetpalasya nīlatvādivadime nīlādirūpāṇāṃ ye sāṃvṛtikā ābhāsāste'pi na santyatyantābhāvarūpāḥ |
SA10n1014:4009: [56] ' yat kiñcit samudayadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakam ' ityamunānumānena samyaktayā kṣaṇikatvena sthitasya vastudharmiṇaḥ siddhirninirdaṣṭeti yaduktaṃ tadapyutpādavināśadharmiṇo jñānena nairātmyapraveśārthaṃ śrāvakānadhikṛtya pudgalanairātmyamabhipretya coktam,
SA10n1014:4011: yato hi bhagavatā saṃskārāṇāmutpādavināśasvabhāvasya samyaganudarśanaṃ taduddeśaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāmiva nirmitasadṛśamityuktam |
SA10n1014:4013: āryadharmasaṃgītau hi tathāgatena bhayasthānasya parihārārthaṃ vyavahāre cotpādanirodhau tāvaduktau |
SA10n1014:4017: yathā mayā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā |
SA10n1014:4021: sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā nāsanna sat punaḥ ||
SA10n1014:4030: ye ca pratyutpanne pṛthagutpannāste vartamānakāla ityubhidhīyante |
SA10n1014:4031: vartamānakālotpannāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni na sthitāni nāpyasthitānīti parijñāyante |
SA10n1014:4043: trayātmakatvāt kṣaṇasyaivaṃ na lokasya kṣaṇaṃ sthitiḥ ||
SA10n1014:4045: tadapi sūtrāntareṣu sakalasāmagrīsamavadhānāt samutpadyamānānāmagnidhūmādīnāṃ sāmānyena niṣedhaparakameva |
SA10n1014:4046: ato naiva tat paramārthamadhikṛtyoktamiti nirdiṣṭameva pūrvam |
SA10n1014:4048: samavāyād vinirmukto buddhayā bhāvo na gṛhyate |
SA10n1014:4052: samavāyāt pṛthaṅ nāsti na cānyasya pṛthak sthitiḥ ||
SA10n1014:4054: na skandhā dhātavo naiva sarve dharmā alakṣaṇāḥ |
SA10n1014:4067: paramārthastu yadā na kasyacanotpādastadā'hetukatvaṃ tāvadanupapannameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:4070: [59-60] āryadharmasaṃgītau tavaduktam-bodhisattvena tathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yo vyāvahārikatvena nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ,
SA10n1014:4081: [61] yacca tadā vastveva svīkṛtaṃ syādityuktaṃ tatpūrvaṃ kṛtottarameva |
SA10n1014:4082: [ 62-64 ] kā nāma saṃvṛtiryadi sarvamevāsaditi yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yuktisaṃṅgatam,
SA10n1014:4086: yacca samyaṅ niḥsvabhāvaṃ vastu tasya tannivṛttakāre yā samāropikā bhrāntabuddhiḥ,
SA10n1014:4088: athavā yayā tattvamāvriyate [ yayā vā tattvabodhaḥ ] bādhyate,
SA10n1014:4091: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ |
SA10n1014:4103: tattvānyatvayostāvat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt tattvānyatvavirodha iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:4107: ato bhāvamabhāvaṃ vā svabhāvamāśrita yattāvaccodyaṃ tatsarvaṃ nirādhārameva |
SA10n1014:4108: vastunyeva tāvad vidhirvā pratiṣedho vā sambhavī |
SA10n1014:4115: asāmarthādināṃ paramārthasatyāśritatvena sāmarthyādīnāṃ ca saṃvṛtisatyāśritatvena vyavasthīyamānatvāt |
SA10n1014:4116: māyāpuruṣādivat sarvavastuṣu bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthāpanāt krmaśaḥ satyadvayabhedo vyavasthāpyate |
SA10n1014:4118: tathā sarvavastuṣu mithyākārena jñānena yadāropitaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti vyavahriyate |
SA10n1014:4119: māyāpuruṣādau abhrāntairyathā vyavasthīyate tathaiva sarvavastuṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ samyakpramāṇaiḥ sampratipādyate,
SA10n1014:4121: ato māyādivyavahāra ivāpekṣāviśeṣena satyadvayaśritā ime sarvavyavahārā aviruddhā evetyavaśyamabhyupetavyam |
SA10n1014:4122: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā taimirikādyālambiteṣu keśādiṣu vijñānavādināṃ ca dvayābhāseṣu kimivemāni codyāni na syuḥ |
SA10n1014:4123: itthaṃ yadīme keśādayaḥ paramārthato'santa eva tadā kathamiva te sadrūpeṇāvabhāsante,
SA10n1014:4124: kathamiva ca deśakālāvasthānāṃ pṛthaṅ niścayaḥ parigṛhyate |
SA10n1014:4125: utpādānutpādādayaḥ sadasatī ca parasparamekasmin naiva yujyate,
SA10n1014:4126: yato hi tatra yathā keśādiṣu dvayābhāseṣu ca bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthitasvabhāvasya saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyamāśritya saṃvṛtau sattvaṃ paramārthe cāsattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA10n1014:4128: tathaiva sarvavastūnāṃ sādṛśyena nedaṃ codyaṃ yujyata eva |
SA10n1014:4130: teṣāmayamāśayaḥ-yena hetunā yathoktabhrāntanāṃ saṃvṛtasvabhāvānāṃ vastūnāṃ naiva samyagutpādo jāyate tathāpyutpattisādṛśyamupadṛśyate,
SA10n1014:4132: ata eva bhagavatā cāpyuktam-“ bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā “ iti |
SA10n1014:4135: pratyakṣeṇa va paramparayā vā kṛta bhedā api santi |
SA10n1014:4137: itthaṃ paramārthato'nutpada iti samyagjñānena asiddhotpāda ityeva vakṣyate |
SA10n1014:4138: ata ubhe api na sto'sambaddhābhidhāne yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā bhavadbhirapi ' sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato'nutpannāni' ityādīnāmarthaḥ kathamupanīyate,
SA10n1014:4139: kathaṃ vā bhavatāṃ satyadvayāśrito vyavahāraḥ pravartate |
SA10n1014:4140: yadi niyataṃ śabdārthamatiricya mithyaiva pare dūṣyante tadā spaṣṭamasambaddhāmevābhidhānaṃ parilakṣyate |
SA10n1014:4142: yato hi cintanotpannasya prajñātattvasyāviparītatvena niyatacintanagatasamyakpramāṇabalotpannaṃ tathaiva bhāvanābalotpannamapi kalpitamevocyate,
SA10n1014:4159: ataḥ karmafalādīnāṃ pṛthakśo niyatavyavasthā yā atyantaparokṣā,
SA10n1014:4162: kecana śāstraracayitāraḥ prasiddhimatītya kalpanādisvabhāvatvenipakalpitaṃ vastu mithyāsaṃvṛtisaditi kathayanti,
SA10n1014:4164: yattu pratītyasamutpadānukūlatvena parikalpitaṃ tattu“ nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ “ ityataḥ saṃvṛtisadevetyuktam |
SA10n1014:4167: [66] yacca 'māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthaḥ' ityuktaṃ tadapyasatyārthe māyārthasya svīkārād doṣahitameva,
SA10n1014:4175: mithyāsvarūpasyāpi satyatvenāvabhāse sati naiva jñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt,
SA10n1014:4178: asatyasvabhāvasya mithyātvād bhrānte sati naiva jñānaṃ syāt,
SA10n1014:4181: ato mithyāsvabhāvatvājjñānasvarūpe'ntarjñeyavādināṃ mate mahān viśeṣo [ bhedaḥ ] jāyate |
SA10n1014:4182: [67] saṃvṛtiḥ śabdamātrātmiketyādi yaduktaṃ tadapi pūrvapakṣarūpeṇa svamatopakalpitmeva |
SA10n1014:4190: teṣāmevaṃ kalpayatāṃ mataniṣedhāryamevābhidheyaṃ kalpanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitamityupadarśitaṃ saṃjñāmātre pratiṣṭhitamityādinā |
SA10n1014:4197: etāvanmātratve sati rūpadīnāṃ sarve vividhābhāsā na setsyanti,
SA10n1014:4199: sūtre'pi paramārthasatyanirdeśasāmarthyena sarveṣāṃ jñānajñeyābhidhānā-dīnāṃ saṃvṛtisatyatvena nirdiṣṭatvānnaiva te śabdamātratvena nirdiṣṭā iti |
SA10n1014:4203: yato hi nirviśeṣaḥ anutpannaḥ aniruddhaḥ abhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādirahitaḥ sa iti |“
SA10n1014:4204: etatsāmarthyena jñānajñeyābhidhānadayaḥ sarve saṃvṛtisatyatvenopadarśitāḥ' saṃvṛtisatyasya paramārthasvabhāvanivṛttatvāt |
SA10n1014:4206: “ etadānukūlyena lokavyavahārastāvajjñānajñeyātmakaḥ akṣaraśabdairnirdiṣṭo'bhidhānātmaka eva saṃvṛtisatyamiti veditavyam,
SA10n1014:4209: evaṃvidhaḥ paramārthaḥ saṃvṛtisatyanivṛttasvabhāva iti nirdeśo'pi kathamupapannaḥ syāt |
SA10n1014:4210: tatra paramārthatvena nirdiṣṭānāmārthānamavastubhūtānāṃ subhāṣitādivibhāgo'pi naiva suśaka iti codyaṃ tāvat siddhasādhanameva |
SA10n1014:4213: ataḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitatvena yadi tathatāsvabhāvo naiva vibhāgārhastadā naivāyaṃ kaścanāpi doṣa iti |
SA10n1014:4214: ityevaṃ ye tāthāgatāgamāḥ pratyakṣaparokṣatayā paramārtathābhidhāyakā dehavatāṃ ca hitasukhajanakāste subhāṣitānītyucyante,
SA10n1014:4215: tadviparītāni na subhāṣitānīti teṣāṃ bhedaḥ sidhyati |
SA10n1014:4216: bhavanmatānusāraṃ tavannāmnaḥ parikalpitasvabhāvatayopādānāt subhāṣitāsubhāṣitarupeṇa kathaṃ vyavasthā kriyate ?
SA10n1014:4223: yato hi abhidheyādisamastavastūni paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvena māyādivat parikalpitasvabhāvāni |
SA10n1014:4225: tathaiva paramārthato niḥsvabhāvāni vastūni kathaṃ na vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyante ?
SA10n1014:4226: viśeṣataḥ kevalaṃ vastusvabhāva eva śabdārthasāmānyasvarūpo bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tatra kimapi kāraṇaṃ naiva paśyāmaḥ |
SA10n1014:4227: anādīti yad viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti vastubhūtaṃ tasyāpyasaditi sāmānyavyavahāro dṛśyate |
SA10n1014:4228: sukhādīni svasaṃvedyāṃ - nittyādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
SA10n1014:4229: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sukhādīnāṃ saṃvṛtyantargatatvāditi pūrvaṃ kṛta eva nirdeśaḥ |
SA10n1014:4230: vastūni kevalamanidarśanasvabhāvāni eva bhaviṣyantīti yaduktaṃ tatrāpi nāsti kācana yuktiḥ,
SA10n1014:4233: na tu satsvabhāvā nirdiṣṭā iti pūrvamuktameva |
SA10n1014:4236: [ kintu ] sa tathā prasajyamātro na bhavati |
SA10n1014:4238: yatāvat paramārthe hyāropitasvabhāvaḥ sa saṃvṛtireva sa [ paramārthastu ] sarvaprapañcātītaḥ |
SA10n1014:4242: yadi paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavākcittaniṣedhamātrasvabhāvaḥ syāttadā sa paramārthasatyamiti saṃkhyāṃ na gacchet,
SA10n1014:4246: teṣu vastuvāsanāyā api pūrvaṃ kṛtaniṣedhāt kevalaṃ saṃvṛtyantargatābyeva tānyoto'nyataḥ pūrtirnaivāvaśyakī |
SA10n1014:4247: yadi pramāṇairabhāvo naiva māyādibhirbhinnastathāpi paramārthataḥ svataḥ saditi nāma kriyate tadā saharṣaṃ kriyatāṃ svairamutsavo'pyanubhūyatām,
SA10n1014:4248: kintu svamatānakūlyena kṛtāṃ vyavasthāṃ vastūni naivānuvidadhate |
SA10n1014:4249: pratītyasamutpannatā svasaṃvedyatā ca naiva vastūno heturbhavati,
SA10n1014:4251: yadyapratītyasamutpannatve vastūni naiva dṛśyate tadā tadadarśanamanyatrāpi tathaiva syāditi kathanasambaddhameva,
SA10n1014:4256: vastūnāṃ yadi samyaktvaṃ tadā sthitatvāsthitatvatoḥ parasparavirodho'pyanupapanna eveti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāditi |
SA10n1014:4260: tāni sarvāṇi calasvabhāvāni vastūni māyādivat prakṛtyā niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇarahitāni,
SA10n1014:4262: so'pi [ svabhāva ] tathāgataḥ syānnavā syāt sarvadā sthitatvānnityaḥ,
SA10n1014:4268: satya iva prasiddhatvāt taccintanādhikareṇa satyeti nāmnā vyavahriyate |
SA10n1014:4275: tayā vyavasthitaṃ jagat tadadhikāreṇa yataḥ satyamityucyate,
SA10n1014:4276: ataḥ saṃvṛtiravaśyaṃ vastutayā svīkartavyeti yaduktaṃ tasyāpyayuktatvāt pratijñā naiva hāpayituṃ śakyā |
SA10n1014:4278: yadi pramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ sā saṃvṛtiḥ ?
SA10n1014:4279: yadyapramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ tayā nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam ?
SA10n1014:4281: yato hi yathā anumānajñānasya mithyākāragrahaṇapravṛtatvāt saṃvṛtisvabhāvatve'pi abhīṣṭarthakriyāprāpakatvāt pramāṇatvamabhyupaganyate tathaiva saṃvṛtisvabhāvasya mithyātve'pi yathānurūpaśravaṇamananādihetuparamparāgatatvāllokikalokottarāthaiḥ sahāvisaṃvādāt pramāṇatvamabhīdhīyate,
SA10n1014:4285: [72] yāni vijñānādīni saṃvṛtibījāni tāni paramārthato'ṅgīkarttavyānīti yaduktaṃ tanna yaktiyuktam |
SA10n1014:4287: yato hyeteṣāṃ svānurūpahetavastāvadanādisaṃvṛtirūpā iti svīkriyanta eva,
SA10n1014:4289: yadi tad bījaṃ paramārthasiddhamekaṃ ceti tadā kutrāpi tadanvayābhāvādanaikāntikameva |
SA10n1014:4290: vṛkṣādyaśeṣasaṃvṛtioināṃ yadyuttaropādānahetvānukūlyaṃ na parikṣiṣyante tadā ramaṇīyatāmātrameva dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāt |
SA10n1014:4292: yakṣānurūpabaleḥ sadbhāvāt sarvāstāḥ saṃvṛtayo'satsvabhāvāḥ prasādhitā eva |
SA10n1014:4293: anyathā [ yadyevaṃ na syāt ] katha tāḥ saṃvṛtaya iti |
SA10n1014:4296: tadviruddhatvād asiddhatvāt pramāṇabādhitatvācceti tā gauṇā eva |

SA10n1014:4324: “ yaduta yadi paramārthalakṣaṇam saṃskārebhyo nānyaṃ [ abhinna ] syāttadā sarve bālapṛthagjanāḥ satyadarśinaḥ syuḥ |

SA10n1014:4330: bhūtārthaprāpteranantaraṃ yogibhiḥ paramārthagaveṣaṇaṃ naiva yujyata iti paramārthastāvat saṃskārebhyo nāstyanyo nānyo'pīti |

SA10n1014:4355: itthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭisamutthitā eva dānādayaḥ parisuddahetusamutthitatvādiṣṭafalaṃ viśeṣafalaṃ cābhinirharanti,

SA10n1014:4376: ata eva bhagavan ye bodhisattvā bhavanti,

SA10n1014:4419: falatastāvadimāni vastūni paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parāpekṣitānītyato niḥsvabhāvanyeva |

SA10n1014:4430: parikalpitātmanā svabhāvato'sattvaṃ tadā naiva siddhasādhanamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam,
SA10n1014:4435: yaccāryāṇāṃ paramajñānagocaraṃ vastūnāmaviparītaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi naiva saditi yuktyagamābhyāṃ pūrvaṃ pratipaditameva |

SA10n1014:4440: yato hi sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato'nādikāladeva praśāntatvādanutpannā ityabhyupagamyante,
SA10n1014:4443: api ca, bhagavatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ santrāsaparivarjanārthamebhirapi prakārairvastūnāmanutpattiḥ sandarśitā,

SA10n1014:4450: sarve tāvad dharmā dharmadhātulakṣaṇāyāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ samarasatvena tathātākāratayā naiva viśeṣotpattirityato'nutpattirabhyupagamyate,
SA10n1014:4459: [ triyānasādhanam ] yadapi sādhanaviśeṇa yānatrayasiddhayanumānaṃ śraddhāviśeṣeṇa ca gotraviśeṣānumānaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tenāpi yanatrayaṃ sādhayituṃ na śakyate |

SA10n1014:4467: te'pi kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante |
SA10n1014:4468: ye kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante |
SA10n1014:4469: ye khalvalpamātrake svasukhe hite cāsajyamānāḥ pareṣu daurmanasyaṃ dhārayanti,

SA10n1014:4479: tasminneva hi sūtre gotrāṇyanātyantikatayaiva nirdiṣṭāni | tathā hi -
SA10n1014:4481: punarapi tathāgatā-dhiṣṭhānāt kadācit karhicit kuśalamūlān vyutthāpayati |
SA10n1014:4488: yato hi tathāgatā lokasya vividhāśayavaśena vividhāni yānāni nirdiśanto dharmopadeśe pravartante,
SA10n1014:4492: tadanantadameva tena aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
SA10n1014:4503: aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ bodhisattvamārge pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ“ iti vistaraḥ |
SA10n1014:4509: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate |

SA10n1014:4612: avidyāvāsabhūmipratyayā anāstravakarmahetukā arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca manomayāstrayaḥ kāyāḥ sambhavanti.....iti“ vistaraḥ |

SA10n1014:4626: atra khalu kāṣṭhodadhyupamayā bhavasāgare pravahamānatvaṃ nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:4627: taraṅgopamayā tāvad dharmalakṣaṇaṃ prati abhiniveśavaśāt parinirvāṇaṃ na prāpyata iti saṅketitam |
SA10n1014:4630: ' niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti' ityādinā tāvannirvāṇanagare'praviṣṭāstathā bhavasāgare'pi na bhramantīti |
SA10n1014:4632: tadantaraṃ tato vyatthāya sambhārān paripūrya buddhatvāvāptirityādikaṃ spaṣṭatayā nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:4633: yaccāpyāryalaṅkāvatārādisūtreṣu nirmitaśrāvakānadhikṛtya śrāvakavyākaranaṃ kṛtaṃ taddhīnādhimuktasattvānāṃ bhayaparihārārthaṃ yānatrayanirdeśopāyapradarśanārthaṃ ceti jñātavyam |
SA10n1014:4639: ato'nayā yuktyā te sattvā buddhatvaṃ pratyabhimukhīkriyanta iti |“

SA10n1014:4656: arhantastāvat kleśakṣayahetoḥ sarvathā naiva pratisandadhate, tathātvāt |

SA10n1014:4675: kṣatriyakule'bhiṣikaḥ kaścana rājakumāro yadi sarvāsāṃ śilpavidyānāmadhyayanaṃ karoti |
SA10n1014:4676: sa nāsti tīkṣṇendriyo'pi tu mandendriyaḥ san paścādadhyeyasya pāṭhayasya prathamam,
SA10n1014:4679: kimetāvatā sa nāsti rājakumāra iti kathayiṣyate ?
SA10n1014:4684: tathaiva bodhisattvagotrakā api ye mandendriyāste pūrvaṃ bhāvanāmārgeṇa kleśakṣayaṃ kṛtvā paścādanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau abhisambuddhā bhaviṣyantīti |“ vistaraḥ |
SA10n1014:4686: tadarthastāvat sarveṣāṃ buddhatvasāmīpyāpekṣābhiprāyeṇeti- yaduktaṃ tadapi svecchāmātropakalpitatvādayuktameva |
SA10n1014:4687: sārvagatikānāṃ bhavyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathoktamityatra ko virodhaḥ |
SA10n1014:4688: tathaiva cāryaratnameghādisūtreṣvapi bhagavataḥ śākyamunernāmaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikabījāropaṇād abhedena sarve sattvā avaivartikatve vyākriyante,
SA10n1014:4690: ato yena śrāvaṇaṃ yena vā śravaṇaṃ yaśca śrotā teṣavapi avaivartikabījāni vidyanta eva,
SA10n1014:4691: yato hi bhavatāṃ mate'pi malānāmāgantukatvāccittaṃ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaramabhyupagamyate |
SA10n1014:4694: sarve sattvāstathāgatagarbhā iti yaduktaṃ tena sarve'pyanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhipadaprāptiyogyā evopadarśitāḥ,
SA10n1014:4695: yato hi tathāgataśbdo dharmadhātuḥ pudgaladharmanairātmyalakṣaṇaḥ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaraścetyeteṣvartheṣvabhyupagamyate |
SA10n1014:4696: tathā ca nirdeśena sarve'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhisvabhāvā eva nirdiṣṭāḥ |
SA10n1014:4697: api ca, ' yānam' iti yaduktaṃ tadapi nirvāṇagaraprāpako jñānātmako mārga evetyuktam,
SA10n1014:4709: ato yattāvat pudgaladharmanairātmyatattvasākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tadeva nirvāṇaprāpakaḥ samyaṅ mārgo nānyaḥ |
SA10n1014:4711: eta eva bhagavatā nānyena tāvanmārgeṇa mokṣa iti nirdiṣṭam |
SA10n1014:4733: ityanena prakrāreṇa dvayasaṃjñānukūlā kṣāntirapi tāvadasattvena jñānavyeti prakaṭitam |
SA10n1014:4734: āryasatyadvayāvatārasūtre'pi prajñaptaṃ yat sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ bhāvābhiniveśa eva |
SA10n1014:4735: ata eva sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvabhāvanayaiva tāvat kleśāḥ parihartuṃ śakyante,
SA10n1014:4736: nānyena kenacinmārgeṇeti kṛto nirdeśaḥ | tathā hi-
SA10n1014:4752: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavanti |
SA10n1014:4754: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃṃ vinītā draṣṭavyā |
SA10n1014:4757: kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato'tyantaśūnyān atyantābhāvān atyantanirnimittān prajānāti,
SA10n1014:4772: taiḥ kumārgavicārān dūrata eva parityajya mahātmabhiryo hi yuktyāgamapradīpaḥ prakāśīkṛtaḥ sadbhiśca puruṣaiḥ [ yaḥ ] muhurmuhurāveditaḥ sa sādaraṃ nirantaraṃ ca sadā sevanīyaḥ |
SA10n1014:4774: sarve ca dharmāḥ paramārthato niḥ svābhāvā iti sidhyati |
SA10n1014:4776: bhāratīyopādhyāśīlendrabodhinā bhoṭadeśīyānuvādakena dpala brcegas mahābhāgena cānūditam |
